text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で\\n追いすがっていると最終直線を走行中\\n不屈の闘:
<size=22>If you're chasing after another girl in
the front during the Final Corner or beyond,
your speed on the Final Straight will
increase</size>
text.レース終盤かつ最終コーナー以降に\\n前の方で詰め寄られると\\n速度を上げ続け: <size=22>During the Final Corner or beyond, if\nyou're in the top 4 and someone is about\nto overtake you, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース中間付近で後方にいると\\nロングスパートをかけて\\n速度をわずかに上げ: <size=22>If you're in the second half of the pack\nhalfway through the race, your speed will\nslightly increase</size>
text.残り200mを切って前の方にいると\\n競り合いに強くなり速度が少し上がる: <size=22>Increase speed slightly when close to\nthe lead in last 200m</size>
text.レース後半に前の方で\\n1番になる力をわずかに発揮する: <size=22>If you're competing for the first position\nduring the second half of the race, your\nspeed and acceleration will increase</size>
text.最終直線で後ろの方から追い抜くと\\n末脚を使って速度が少し上がる: <size=22>If you're not in the front and overtake\nanother girl during the Final Straight,\nyour speed will slightly increase</size>
text.最終直線で余力を持って前にいると\\nわずかに優位を保ちやすくなる:
<size=22>If you're in the front during the Final
Straight with plenty of stamina left,
your speed and acceleration will slightly
increase</size>
text.最終コーナーで中団以降から追い抜くと\\n女帝たる走りで速度が少し上がる: <size=22>If you're not in the front during the\nFinal Corner and are passing someone,\nyour speed will increase</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で競り合うと\\nわずかに抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>If you're competing for the lead on the\nFinal Corner or beyond, your speed and\nacceleration will increase</size>
text.レース終盤のコーナーで中団にいると\\n前の位置につこうとして\\n加速力が少し: <size=22>Gain a slight increase in acceleration\nas you attempt to gain positions during\nthe last corner of the race</size>
text.レース後半のコーナーで好位置に\\n控えていると持久力を少し回復し\\nさらに少: <size=22>If you're near the front during a corner\nin the second half of the race, your speed\nwill increase and your stamina will recover</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に競り合っていると\\n最終直線で前方にいる時\\n強い気持ちが: <size=22>If you're competing for the lead on the\nFinal Corner or beyond, your speed during\nthe Final Straight will increase</size>
text.レース後半に前の方で競り合うとバク\\nシン力（？）を発揮、速度が少し上がる:
<size=22>While fighting for the lead during the
second part of the race, lightly increase
your speed through displaying your Bakushin
power</size>
text.レース中盤で好位置にいる時に\\n持久力が回復する: <size=22>If you're in a good position in the Middle\nLeg, your stamina will recover</size>
text.最終コーナーで後ろの方にいると近くの\\nウマ娘を見て持久力を少し回復する: <size=22>Being at the back during the last corner,\nlightly restores your stamina when you\nsee another girl</size>
text.レース終盤に3番手以降で\\n前方が詰まると\\nお告げの力で少し道を切り開く:
<size=22>If during the Final Leg of the race your
way to the front of the field is blocked,
your power of divination will make it
lightly easier to spot an opening</size>
text.レース終盤に3番手で\\n後ろのウマ娘との差が1バ身以内だと\\n闘志に火が付き:
<size=22>When you're in 3rd place at the end of
the race and about to lose, you gain a
little bit more fighting spirit and lightly
increase your speed</size>
text.レースを冷静に運ぶことができると\\n残り200mで中団にいるとき\\n実力発揮:
<size=22>If you can get calm and composed through
the race, you will be able to showcase
your ability and increase your speed for
the last 200m</size>
text.レース終盤に前の方で相手を抜くと\\n勢いに乗って前に出て\\nさらに加速力がち:
<size=22>During the Final Leg or beyond, if you've
overtaken someone in the first half of
the pack, your acceleration will slightly
increase and you will get a speed boost</size>
text.レース後半に差を付けて先頭にいると\\nさらなる脚を使って、速度を上げる: <size=22>If you're in the first position during\nthe second half of the race, your speed\nwill increase</size>
text.レース終盤に前と差が詰まると\\n最終直線で華麗な脚取りを披露し\\n速度がすご:
<size=22>If you tried to overtake another girl
right in front of you anywhere during
the Final Leg or later, then on the Final
Straight, your speed will greatly increase</size>
text.最終コーナー以降で前の方にいると\\nギアを変えて加速力が上がる: <size=22>Be close to the leader at the final corner\nto increase your acceleration by changing\ngears</size>
text.残り200m地点で前の方にいると\\n道を開いて速度がすごく上がる: <size=22>Be close to the lead during the last 200m\nto make it easier to break through and\nfind a way through the field</size>
text.レース中間付近で後方にいると\\nロングスパートをかけて\\n速度を少し上げ続け: <size=22>If you're in the second half of the pack\nhalfway through the race, your speed will\nincrease</size>
text.残り200mを切って前の方にいると\\n競り合いに強くなり速度が上がる: <size=22>Increase speed when close to the lead\nin last 200m</size>
text.レース後半に前の方で\\n1番になる力を発揮する: <size=22>If you're competing for the first position\nduring the second half of the race, your\nspeed and acceleration will increase</size>
text.最終コーナー後半で好位置にいると\\n弾みを付けて加速力を上げ続ける: <size=22>If you're in the middle of the pack during\nthe second half of the final corner, your\nacceleration will increase</size>
text.最終直線で後ろの方から追い抜くと\\n末脚を使って速度が上がる: <size=22>If you're not in the front and overtake\nanother girl during the Final Straight,\nyour speed slightly increase</size>
text.最終コーナーで前の方にいると\\n抜かせない覚悟を決めて速度が上がる\\n長距離:
<size=22>If you're in the front during the Final
Corner, your speed will increase; bonus
speed if it's a Long race and you have
plenty of stamina left</size>
text.最終直線で余力を持って前にいると\\nより優位を保ちやすくなる:
<size=22>If you're in the front during the Final
Straight with plenty of stamina left,
your speed and acceleration will slightly
increase</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で\\n前または後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\n王たる輝: <size=22>If you're in the front during the Final\nCorner or beyond and there's another girl\nnearby, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤に3回追い抜くと\\n最終直線で速度がすごく上がる: <size=22>During the Final Leg of the race make\nthree overtakes to strongly increase your\nspeed on the final straight</size>
text.最終コーナーで中団以降から追い抜くと\\n女帝たる走りで速度が上がる: <size=22>If you're not in the front during the\nFinal Corner and are passing someone,\nyour speed will increase</size>
text.終盤の最終コーナー以降で前の方だと\\n速度が上がる、冷静さを保っていたなら\\:
<size=22>If if you're in the front during the Final
Corner or beyond, your speed will increase;
bonus speed if you haven't panicked (kakari)
during the race</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で競り合うと\\n抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>If you're competing for the lead on the\nFinal Corner or beyond, your speed and\nacceleration will increase</size>
text.出遅れずに最終直線で前の方にいると\\n速度が上がる、前方の順位をキープ\\nし:
<size=22>If you didn't have a late start to the
race, and you're in the front during the
Final Straight, your speed will increase;
bonus speed if you've been in the front
for the entire race</size>
text.レース終盤のコーナーで中団にいると\\n前の位置につこうとして加速力が上がる: <size=22>Increase acceleration as you attempt to\novertake on a corner in the Final Leg\nor beyond</size>
text.レース終盤に追い抜いて\\n先団につけると最終直線で\\n強い意志を持って速度が:
<size=22>If you've overtaken another girl in the
front during the Final Leg or beyond,
then on the Final Straight, your speed
will increase</size>
text.レース後半のコーナーで\\n好位置に控えていると持久力を回復し\\nさらに少しの: <size=22>If you're near the front during a corner\nin the second half of the race, your speed\nwill increase and your stamina will recover</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に競り合っていると\\n最終直線で前方にいる時\\n強い気持ちが: <size=22>If you're competing for the lead on the\nFinal Corner or beyond, your speed during\nthe Final Straight will increase</size>
text.レース後半に前の方で競り合うと\\nバクシン力（？）を発揮、速度が上がる: <size=22>During the later half of the race, your\nspeed increases when competing for the\nlead</size>
text.レース中盤で好位置にいる時に\\n持久力がすごく回復する: <size=22>If you're in a good position in the Middle\nLeg, your stamina will recover</size>
text.最終コーナーで後ろの方にいると近くの\\nウマ娘を見て持久力を回復する: <size=22>When in the back in last corner, restore\nyour stamina when you see another girl</size>
text.レース終盤に3番手以降で\\n前方が詰まると\\nお告げの力で道を切り開く: <size=22>When the front is packed during the Final\nLeg of the race, the oracle's power will\nopen a path</size>
text.レース終盤に3番手で\\n後ろのウマ娘との差が1バ身以内だと\\n秘めた闘志に火: <size=22>When you're in 3rd place at the end of\nthe race and about to lose, your speed\nincreases</size>
text.レースを冷静に運ぶことができると\\n残り200mで中団にいるとき\\n実力発揮: <size=22>After proceeding through the race calmly,\nyour speed drastically increases during\nthe last 200m</size>

text.レース序盤または中盤に前が詰まると\\n強い意志を保ち持久力が回復し\\nコース:
<size=22>During the Opening or Middle Leg, if you're

movement speed will increase and your

text.レース中盤が迫ったとき\\n中団以降にいると持久力を回復する\\n＜作戦・差し＞: <size=22>Betweener・During the second half of the\nOpening Leg, if you're not in the front,\nyour stamina will recover</size>
text.レース中盤が迫ったとき\\n中団以降にいると持久力を\\nわずかに回復する＜作戦: <size=22>Betweener・During the second half of the\nOpening Leg, if you're not in the front,\nyour stamina will slightly recover</size>
text.レースへの渇望により\\n能力が少し発揮しやすくなる: <size=22>The thirst for racing increases your Stamina\nstat by 40</size>
text.かつての走りとは違うがあの頃と\\n変わらない想いが能力をすごく上げる: <size=22>Feelings from the days past will increase\nyour Speed stat by 80</size>
text.最終直線を走行中に競り合うと\\n可憐にぶっ飛ばして速度を上げる: <size=22>If you struggle for victory on the last\nstraight, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース後半に中団から\\n『お友達』を追って速度を少しずつ上げ\\n前方のウマ娘:
<size=22>If you're in the middle of the pack in
the second half of the race, your speed
will increase while draining the speed
of the girls ahead of you</size>
text.終盤の最終直線で好位置にいると\\n速度が上がる＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・If you're in a good position on\nthe Final Straight during the Final Leg,\nyour speed will increase</size>
text.終盤の最終直線で好位置にいると\\n速度がわずかに上がる＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・If you're in a good position on\nthe Final Straight during the Final Leg,\nyour speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース終盤に先団で詰め寄られると\\n最終コーナー以降に闘志を燃やして\\n速度:
<size=22>If someone has been trying to overtake
you in the first half of the pack during
the Final Leg or beyond, then on the Final
Corner, your speed will increase</size>
text.最終コーナー走行中に中団で競り合うと\\n抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>If you're blocked in the middle of the\npack at the final corner, it will become\neasier to get out</size>
text.秋のレースが得意になり\\nスピードとパワーが上昇する: <size=22>Your Speed and Power stats are increased\nby 60 in autumn races</size>
text.最終直線を走行中に前の方で\\n追い抜こうとするか詰め寄られると\\nテンション:
<size=22>If you're in the front during the Final
Straight and you've been trying to overtake
someone or someone has been trying to
overtake you, your speed will increase</size>
text.掛からず、中盤の最終コーナーか\\n終盤の最終コーナーではないコーナーを\\n中: <size=22>If you keep your calm in the middle of\nthe pack during a Middle or Final Leg\ncorner, your acceleration will increase</size>
text.京都レース場が得意になり\\nスタミナ、賢さ、スピードが上昇する: <size=22>In Kyoto, your Speed, Stamina, and Wisdom\nstats are increased by 60</size>
text.スキルで持久力を3回以上回復すると\\nレース後半で勝利に向かい\\n呼吸を整え:
<size=22>If you activate at least 3 recovery skills,
then in the second half of the race, your
speed and acceleration will increase,
and you'll recover more stamina</size>
text.スタート後からレース後半まで\\n好位置を維持し続けるとレース中盤に\\n勝利へ: <size=22>If you maintain good position from the\nstart to the second half of the race,\nyour speed will increase</size>
text.追い抜く気持ちが湧き\\n疲れにくくなる＜長距離＞: <size=22>Long・Your stamina will recover when you're\nabout to overtake someone</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で前方にいると\\n加速力がわずかに上がる＜作戦・先行＞:
<size=22>Leader・During the first half of the Final
Leg, if you're in the first half of the
pack, your acceleration will slightly
increase</size>
text.レース後半に好位置で競り合うと\\n走ることに心を躍らせて\\n速度を上げる: <size=22>If you're competing for good position\nin the second half of the race, your speed\nwill increase</size>
text.レース中盤に後方にいると\\n持久力がわずかに回復する＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you're behind in the Middle Leg,\nyour stamina will slightly recover</size>
text.レース後半の直線で好位置にいる\\nまたは中団から前を狙うと\\n稲妻の如く駆け:
<size=22>In the second half of the race on a straight,
if you're in a good position or aiming
for one from the back of the pack, you
will start running like a lightning bolt</size>
text.レース中盤にスキルを多く発動すると\\n速度が上がる: <size=22>If you activate at least 3 skills during\nthe Middle Leg, your speed will increase</size>
text.見たい景色を必死に追いかけ\\n能力が少し発揮しやすくなる: <size=22>Frantically chasing after the scenery,\nyour Speed stat is increased by 40</size>
text.トレーナーの恐れが伝播し\\n能力が少し発揮しにくくなる: <size=22>As the trainer's fears spread, your Speed\nstat is decreased by 40</size>
text.トレーナーの恐れがより鮮明になり\\nレース後半のコーナーで\\n速度がすごく下: <size=22>As the trainer's fears become more vivid,\nyour speed is significantly decreased</size>
text.みんなの想いと共に\\nゴールを走り抜ける気持ちを強く持つと\\n最終直線で速度: <size=22>If you have a strong desire to run through\nthe finish line with everyone, your speed\nwill increase on the final straight line</size>
text.レース後半のコーナーで思いっきりの\\n応援が届くとサイレンススズカの\\n持久: <size=22>When Silence Suzuka hears shouts of support\nin the second half of the race, her stamina\nwill recover</size>
text.残り400m地点で先団だと速度を上げる\\nそれまでに7回以上スキルを\\n使っ:
<size=22>If you're in the front with 400 m remaining
in the race, your speed will increase;
bonus speed if you've activated at least
7 skills</size>
text.最終コーナーで先頭から離されていると\\nその距離が遠いほど頑張り続けて\\n速: <size=22>The farther you are from the front during\nthe final corner, the more will your speed\nincrease</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき前方にいると\\n速度が上がる＜長距離＞: <size=22>Long・During the second half of the Middle\nLeg, if you're in the first half of the\npack, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき前方にいると\\n速度がわずかに上がる＜長距離＞: <size=22>Long・During the second half of the Middle\nLeg, if you're in the first half of the\npack, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース中盤に後方にいると\\nしばらくの間速度が少し上がる\\n＜作戦・追込＞: <size=22>Chaser・If you're in the second half of\nthe pack at a random point during the\nMiddle Leg, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース中盤に後方にいると\\nしばらくの間速度がちょっと上がる\\n＜作戦・追込: <size=22>Chaser・If you're in the second half of\nthe pack at a random point during the\nMiddle Leg, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース後半に速度がすごく上がるが\\nすごく疲れてしまうことがある: <size=22>Your speed will significantly increase\nin the second half of the race, but sometimes\nyou will also become very tired</size>
text.レース後半に速度が少し上がるが\\nすごく疲れてしまうことがある: <size=22>Your speed will increase in the second\nhalf of the race, but sometimes you will\nalso become very tired</size>
text.レーシングカーニバルで獲得するカーニ\\nバルptにボーナスが付く（＋{0}％）: <size=22>Bonus points will be added to the carnival\npoints obtained. This skill will disappear\nat the end of the event.</size>
text.残り300mを切って好位置にいるとき\\n前のウマ娘との距離が近いと\\n強い想:
<size=22>If you are in a good position with less
than 300 meters remaining and catching
up to the girl in front of you, your speed
will increase</size>
text.春のレースが得意になり\\nスピードとパワーが上昇する: <size=22>Your Speed and Power stats are increased\nby 60 in spring races</size>
text.最終直線で後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\nこの瞬間に懸け持久力をわずかに使い\\:
<size=22>If there's another girl right behind you
during the Final Straight, use a little
of your stamina in exchange for a significant
increase in speed</size>
text.中盤のコーナーで先団を走行中\\n後ろに他ウマ娘を検知すると\\nわずかに息を入: <size=22>During any Middle Leg corner, if you detect\nanother girl right behind you, your speed\nwill increase and stamina will recover</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に2回追い抜くと\\n抱いた誇りを力に変えて\\n最終直線で速度:
<size=22>If you've overtaken at least two other
girls after entering the Final Corner,
then on the Final Straight, your speed
will increase</size>
text.直線で速度が上がる＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・At a random point on a random straight,\nyour speed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき前方にいると\\n速度が上がる＜短距離＞: <size=22>Short・If you're in the first half of the\npack during the second half of the Middle\nLeg, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき前方にいると\\n速度がわずかに上がる＜短距離＞: <size=22>Short・If you're in the first half of the\npack during the second half of the Middle\nLeg, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.最終直線で先頭から離されていると\\n星に導かれるように速度が上がる\\n最後方: <size=22>If you're far away from the front on the\nLast Straight, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース中間付近で中団にいるとき\\n気合を入れ直して持久力を少し回復し\\nさら:
<size=22>If you're in the middle of the pack in
the second half of the race, your stamina
will recover and your speed will increase
slightly</size>
text.レース中間付近で中団にいるとき\\n気合を入れ直して持久力を回復し\\nさらに速: <size=22>If you're in the middle of the pack in\nthe second half of the race, your stamina\nwill recover and your speed will increase</size>
text.前方にいるとき、レース後半の第3\\nコーナーで速度を少し上げる、または\\n終:
<size=22>If you're in front of the pack, your speed
will increase at the third corner (if
it's in the second half of the race),
or alternatively, your acceleration will
increase near the end of the race</size>
text.「良」のバ場状態が得意になり\\nパワーとスピードが上昇する: <size=22>Your Power and Speed stat is increased\nby 80 in races with Good track condition</size>
text.直線で速度が上がる＜長距離＞: <size=22>Long・At a random point on a random straight,\nyour speed will increase</size>
text.通常の逃げの作戦よりさらに大きく\\n後続を引き離して、そのまま最後まで\\n逃: <size=22>Runner・Your strategy changes to "Great\nEscape" (a strategy even more aggressive\nthan Runner)</size>
text.レース後半に呼吸を整え前へ踏み込む\\n育成で重ねた勝利の数だけ効果が高まる:
<size=22>In the second half of the race, the more
wins you've achieved in the training,
the more your speed and acceleration increase,
and your stamina recovers</size>
text.レース後半に\\nちょっと呼吸を整え前へ踏み込む\\n育成で重ねた勝利の数だけ効:
<size=22>In the second half of the race, the more
wins you've achieved in the training,
the more your speed and acceleration increase,
and your stamina recovers</size>
text.最終直線に入ったとき好位置につけて\\nいると強い意志で速度が上がる\\n先頭が: <size=22>If you're in a good position on the last\nstraight, your speed will increase</size>
text.右回りコースが得意になり\\nスピードとパワーが上昇する: <size=22>Your Speed and Power stats are increased\nby 60 on clockwise tracks</size>
text.レース後半に中団から残り持久力に\\n応じたロングスパートをかけて\\n速度をわ:
<size=22>In the second half of the race, if you're
in the middle of the pack, your speed
will increase (the more stamina you have
remaining, the longer the duration)</size>
text.期待を背負った強い想いが力に変わり\\n最終コーナーで速度が上がる\\n＜長距離: <size=22>Long・Your speed will increase on the Final\nCorner</size>
text.レース中盤始めの方に中団にいると\\n速度をわずかに落として\\n持久力をすごく:
<size=22>Long・If you're in the middle of the pack
during the first half of the Middle Leg,
your speed will slightly decrease and
your stamina will recover greatly</size>
text.レース中盤始めの方に中団にいると\\n速度をわずかに落として\\n持久力を少し回:
<size=22>Long・If you're in the middle of the pack
during the first half of the Middle Leg,
your speed will slightly decrease and
your stamina will recover</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に先団で追い抜くと\\n煌めくような華麗な動きを披露し\\n少し: <size=22>If you overtake someone in the front during\nthe Final Corner, your speed will greatly\nincrease</size>
text.終盤の直線で前の方にいると意気揚々と\\n速度を上げる、そこが向正面の場合\\n:
<size=22>During the Final Leg or beyond, if you're
in the front during any straight, your
speed will increase; if the straight is
on the opposite side from the audience,
your acceleration will slightly increase
too</size>
text.レース序盤または中盤に\\n追い抜かれるか競り合ったとき\\n速度が上がる＜作戦:
<size=22>Runner・If you've been overtaken or are
being blocked from the side during the
early stages of the race, your speed will
increase</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で中団以降にいると\\n加速力が上がる＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・During the first half of the Final\nLeg, if you're not near the front, your\nacceleration will increase</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で中団以降にいると\\n加速力がわずかに上がる＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・During the first half of the Final\nLeg, if you're not near the front, your\nacceleration will slightly increase</size>
text.レース中盤に中団で競り合うと\\n持久力が少し回復し\\nさらに速度が上がる＜中:
<size=22>Medium・If you're in the middle of the
pack during the Middle Leg and someone
is blocking you from the side, your speed
will increase and your stamina will slightly
recover</size>
text.レース中盤に中団で競り合うと\\n持久力がちょっと回復し\\nさらに速度がわずか:
<size=22>Medium・If you're in the middle of the
pack during the Middle Leg and someone
is blocking you from the side, your speed
will slightly increase and your stamina
will marginally recover</size>
text.レース中盤に後ろの方にいると\\n速度が上がる＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・If you're in the second half of\nthe pack at a random point during the\nMiddle Leg, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース中盤に後ろの方にいると\\n速度がわずかに上がる＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・If you're in the second half of\nthe pack at a random point during the\nMiddle Leg, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース中盤のコーナーで競り合っていた\\n場合、終盤かつ最終コーナー半ば以降に\: <size=22>If you're trying to push for the front\nnear the end of the race, your acceleration\nwill increase</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で前方にいると\\n加速力が上がる＜作戦・先行＞: <size=22>Leader・During the first half of the Final\nLeg, if you're in the first half of the\npack, your acceleration will increase</size>
text.レーシングカーニバルで基礎能力+{0}\\n％、さらに{1}％の確率で絶好調にな:
<size=22>Your stats will be raised by x％ and there
is a y％ chance for your motivation to
be raised to Perfect during carnival races.
This skill will disappear at the end of
the event.</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜いていた場合\\n残り300mを切って先団にいるとき\\:
<size=22>If you've overtaken someone during or
after the Final Corner, your speed will
increase in the last 300 meters if you're
in front of the pack</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜いていた場合\\n最終直線で中団にいると速度が上がる\\:
<size=22>If you're in the middle of the pack during
the Final Straight, and you've overtaken
someone since entering the final corner,
your speed will increase (bonus duration
if you're not popular)</size>
text.レース前半、掛からず最後方付近に\\n控え続けていると、最終直線で\\n気合を爆:
<size=22>If you stay near the back of the pack
without panicking during the first half
of the race, your acceleration will increase
on the Final Straight</size>
text.最終コーナーで後ろの方にいると\\n速度が上がる＜マイル＞: <size=22>Mile・If you're in the back of the pack\nduring the last corner, your speed will\nincrease</size>
text.最終コーナーで後ろの方にいると\\n速度がわずかに上がる＜マイル＞: <size=22>Mile・If you're in the back of the pack\nduring the last corner, your speed will\nslightly increase</size>
text.レース後半に中団にいると速度が上がり\\nさらに加速力がちょっと上がる\\n＜作: <size=22>Betweener・If you're in the middle of the\npack during the second half of the race,\nyour speed and acceleration will increase</size>
text.レース後半に中団にいると\\n速度がわずかに上がりさらに加速力が\\nほんのちょ:
<size=22>Betweener・If you're in the middle of the
pack during the second half of the race,
your speed and acceleration will slightly
increase</size>
text.スタートがすごく苦手になり出遅れたり\\nスタート時の加速力が低下したりする\\: <size=22>Guarantees a late start and lowers your\nacceleration tremendously. This skill\nwill disappear at the end of the training.</size>
text.残り300m付近で前の方だと速度を少し\\n上げる、ちょうど坂を上りきったところ:
<size=22>If you're in the front with 300 m remaining
in the race, your speed will increase;
bonus speed if you have just finished
climbing up a hill</size>
text.レース中盤に前の方にいると\\n後ろの速度をわずかに下げ\\n自分の速度を上げる: <size=22>Medium・If you're in the front during the\nMiddle Leg, you will drain the speed of\nthe girls behind you and speed up yourself</size>
text.レース中盤に前の方にいると\\n後ろの速度をほんのわずかに下げ\\n自分の速度を:
<size=22>Medium・If you're in the front during the
Middle Leg, you will slightly drain the
speed of the girls behind you and slightly
speed up yourself</size>
text.スタート後からレース後半まで前の方を\\nキープすると気分を爆アゲして持久力を\:
<size=22>If you've been in the front of the pack
for the entire first half of the race,
your stamina will recover and your speed
will increase</size>
text.すぐ後ろにウマ娘が長くいると\\n速度が上がる: <size=22>If another girl has been following you\nfor a while, your speed will increase</size>
text.終盤の最終コーナー以降に\\n好位置にいると速度が上がる\\nゴールまで遠い場合:
<size=22>If you're in a good position during the
Final Corner or beyond, your speed will
increase; if there's still more than 400m
left in the race, your acceleration will
increase too</size>
text.残り350mを切って\\n前の方で後ろのウマ娘との距離が近いと\\n譲らぬ思いで:
<size=22>If you're in a good position with less
than 350m remaining in the race and there's
another girl right behind you, your speed
and acceleration will increase</size>
text.レース中盤に持久力を少し使って\\n速度をすごく上げる＜作戦・差し＞: <size=22>Betweener・At a random point during the\nMiddle Leg, use a little extra stamina\nto increase your speed greatly</size>
text.レース中盤に持久力を少し使って\\n速度を少し上げる＜作戦・差し＞: <size=22>Betweener・At a random point during the\nMiddle Leg, use a little extra stamina\nto increase your speed</size>
text.レース前半中団以降に控え続けており\\n追い比べをしていると\\n江戸っ子の底力:
<size=22>If you stayed behind for the entire first
half of the race, and then directly compete
for position with another girl on the
Final Straight, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース中盤に後方にいると\\n持久力が回復し速度が上がる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you're in the second half of the\npack in the Middle Leg, your stamina will\nrecover and your speed will increase</size>
text.最終コーナー突入時まで冷静に後方で\\n控えていると残り300m地点でスピード\:
<size=22>If you stay in the second half of the
pack for the entire race without panicking,
you will speed up on the Final Corner
or beyond when there's 300 m remaining
in the race</size>
text.出遅れる時間が長くなり\\nさらに賢さが少し下がる: <size=22>Your Wisdom stat is decreased by 40 and\nyou are guaranteed to start late</size>
text.賢さが上がり、少し掛かりづらくなる: <size=22>Your Wisdom stat is increased by 60 and\nyou're a little harder to panic</size>
text.残り200m地点で前の方にいると速度を\\n上げる、さらに先頭のウマ娘と近い場合:
<size=22>With 200 meters remaining in the race,
your target speed will increase if you're
near the front, and you will also immediately
speed up if you're close to the first
position</size>
text.終盤目前の下り坂で中団に控えていて\\nゴールまで遠いとレースを\\n思いっきり: <size=22>If you're in the middle of the pack on\na downhill late into the race, your speed\nwill increase</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に中団の内ラチ側にい\\nると勝利への道筋を見出して最終直線で\:
<size=22>If you're in the middle of the pack and
near the inner fence during the Final
Corner or later, your speed will increase
on the Final Straight</size>
text.直線で速度が上がる\\n＜作戦・追込＞: <size=22>Chaser・At a random point on a random straight,\nyour speed will increase</size>
text.圧倒的なウマ娘たちに気圧され\\n根性と賢さが少し下がる: <size=22>Your Guts and Wisdom stat are decreased\nby 40</size>
text.終盤最終コーナーでスキルを発動すると\\n声援を胸に速度を少し上げる\\n中山レ: <size=22>If you activate any skill on the Final\nCorner, your speed will increase; the\neffect is stronger in Nakayama</size>
text.コーナーで速度が上がる＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・At a random point on a random corner,\nyour speed will increase</size>
text.全身全霊、ぶつけます！: <size=22>Your speed is increased in the last 400m\nof the race</size>
text.真剣勝負、いざ参ります！: <size=22>Your speed is increased in the last 400m\nof the race</size>
text.レース後半どっかで速度をわずかに上げ\\nついでに使えそうなレアスキルを2つ\\:
<size=22>At a random point in the second half of
the race, your speed will increase and
you will activate two of your gold skills
at random, ignoring their conditions</size>
text.レース後半に先団にいると残りの\\n持久力に応じたロングスパートをかけて\\n速:
<size=22>If you're in front in the second half
of the race, your speed will increase;
bonus duration depending on your remaining
stamina</size>
text.出遅れずにスタートを切れると\\n中盤始めの方で持久力をすごく回復する\\n＜先: <size=22>Leader・Long・If you didn't have a late\nstart to the race, your stamina will recover\nin the first half of the Middle Leg</size>
text.出遅れずにスタートを切れると\\n中盤始めの方で持久力を少し回復する\\n＜先行:
<size=22>Leader・Long・If you didn't have a late
start to the race, your stamina will recover
a little in the first half of the Middle
Leg</size>
text.終盤最終コーナー以降に後方から迫ると\\n短い間加速力がちょっと上がる\\n効果:
<size=22>During or after the Final Corner, if you're
in the second half of the pack, your acceleration
will increase; bonus duration and effect
strength for overtaking up to 3 times</size>
text.終盤が迫ったときどこかで速度を少し\\n上げ、さらに能力を引き出すスキルの\\n:
<size=22>In the second half of the Middle Leg,
your speed and acceleration will increase
depending on the amount of green skills
you've activated</size>
text.川崎レース場が得意になる: <size=22>In Kawasaki, your Stamina stat is increased\nby 60</size>

text.川崎レース場が少し苦手になる: <size=22>In Kawasaki, your Stamina stat is decreased\nby 40</size>
text.船橋レース場が得意になる: <size=22>In Funabashi, your Stamina stat is increased\nby 60</size>
text.船橋レース場が少し得意になる: <size=22>In Funabashi, your Stamina stat is increased\nby 40</size>
text.船橋レース場が少し苦手になる: <size=22>In Funabashi, your Stamina stat is decreased\nby 40</size>
text.盛岡レース場が得意になる: <size=22>In Morioka, your Stamina stat is increased\nby 60</size>
text.盛岡レース場が少し得意になる: <size=22>In Morioka, your Stamina stat is increased\nby 40</size>
text.盛岡レース場が少し苦手になる: <size=22>In Morioka, your Stamina stat is decreased\nby 40</size>
text.ナイターのレースが得意になる: <size=22>Your Wisdom stat is increased by 60 in\nraces at night</size>
text.ナイターのレースが少し得意になる: <size=22>Your Wisdom stat is increased by 40 in\nraces at night</size>
text.ナイターのレースが少し苦手になる: <size=22>Your Wisdom stat is decreased by 40 in\nraces at night</size>
text.小回りのコースが得意になる: <size=22>Your Wisdom stat is increased by 60 at\nracetracks with tight corners</size>
text.小回りのコースが少し得意になる: <size=22>Your Wisdom stat is increased by 40 at\nracetracks with tight corners</size>
text.小回りのコースが少し苦手になる: <size=22>Your Wisdom stat is decreased by 40 at\nracetracks with tight corners</size>
text.交流重賞のレースが得意になる: <size=22>Your Speed stat is increased by 60 in\nexchange races (Kawasaki, Funabashi, Morioka,\nand Ooi racetracks)</size>
text.交流重賞のレースが少し得意になる: <size=22>Your Speed stat is increased by 40 in\nexchange races (Kawasaki, Funabashi, Morioka,\nand Ooi racetracks)</size>
text.交流重賞のレースが少し苦手になる: <size=22>Your Speed stat is decreased by 40 in\nexchange races (Kawasaki, Funabashi, Morioka,\nand Ooi racetracks)</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき前方にいると\\n速度が上がる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you're in the first half of the\npack during the second half of the Middle\nLeg, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき前方にいると\\n速度がわずかに上がる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you're in the first half of the\npack during the second half of the Middle\nLeg, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース中盤に後ろの方にいると\\n速度が上がる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you're in the second half of the\npack during the Middle Leg, your speed\nwill increase</size>
text.レース中盤に後ろの方にいると\\n速度がわずかに上がる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you're in the second half of the\npack during the Middle Leg, your speed\nwill slightly increase</size>
text.ラストスパートで前方にいると\\n速度が上がる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you're in the first half of the\npack during the Last Spurt, your speed\nwill increase</size>
text.ラストスパートで前方にいると\\n速度がわずかに上がる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you're in the first half of the\npack during the Last Spurt, your speed\nwill slightly increase</size>
text.スキルで持久力を回復していると\\nレース中盤始めの方に後方で\\n速度が上がる:
<size=22>Dirt・If you're in the second half of the
pack and you've recovered stamina with
a skill, your speed will increase in the
Middle Leg</size>
text.スキルで持久力を回復していると\\nレース中盤始めの方に後方で\\n速度がわずか:
<size=22>Dirt・If you're in the second half of the
pack and you've recovered stamina with
a skill, your speed will slightly increase
in the Middle Leg</size>
text.前のウマ娘のすぐ後ろに付けると\\n速度が上がる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you've been following another\ngirl for at least three seconds, your\nspeed will increase</size>
text.前のウマ娘のすぐ後ろに付けると\\n速度がわずかに上がる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you've been following another\ngirl for at least three seconds, your\nspeed will slightly increase</size>
text.前のウマ娘のすぐ後ろに付けると\\n速度が少し下がる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you've been following another\ngirl for at least three seconds, your\nspeed will slightly decrease</size>
text.レース終盤に前方にいると\\n加速力が上がる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you're in the first half of the\npack during the Final Leg, your acceleration\nwill increase</size>
text.レース終盤に前方にいると\\n加速力がわずかに上がる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you're in the first half of the\npack during the Final Leg, your acceleration\nwill slightly increase</size>
text.レース終盤に中団以降にいると\\n加速力が上がる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you're in the second half of the\npack during the Final Leg, your acceleration\nwill increase</size>
text.レース終盤に中団以降にいると\\n加速力がわずかに上がる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you're in the second half of the\npack during the Final Leg, your acceleration\nwill slightly increase</size>
text.パワーが十分に強いとスピードが上がる\\nパワーが十二分に仕上がっている場合は\: <size=22>Dirt・If your Power stat is 1000 or higher,\ngain 60 Speed stat; if it's 1200 or higher,\ngain 80 instead</size>
text.パワーが十分に強いとスピードがわずか\\nに上がる、パワーが十二分に仕上がって\: <size=22>Dirt・If your Power stat is 1000 or higher,\ngain 20 Speed stat; if it's 1200 or higher,\ngain 40 instead</size>
text.バ場状態が重か不良のレースが\\n得意になりスピードとパワーが上がる\\n＜ダー: <size=22>Dirt・Your Speed and Power stats are increased\nby 60 in races with Heavy or Bad track\ncondition</size>
text.バ場状態が重か不良のレースが\\n得意になりスピードが上がる\\n＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・Your Speed stat is increased by 60\nin races with Heavy or Bad track condition</size>
text.バ場状態が重か不良のレースが\\n得意になりスピードが少し上がる\\n＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・Your Speed stat is increased by 40\nin races with Heavy or Bad track condition</size>
text.バ場状態が重か不良のレースが\\n苦手になりスピードが少し下がる\\n＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・Your Speed stat is decreased by 40\nin races with Heavy or Bad track condition</size>
text.レース序盤に先頭にいるとき\\nすぐ後ろにいるウマ娘の速度が下がる\\n＜ダート: <size=22>Dirt・If you're in the lead during the\nOpening Leg and there's another girl right\nbehind you, she will slow down</size>
text.レース序盤に先頭にいるとき\\nすぐ後ろにいるウマ娘の速度が\\nわずかに下がる: <size=22>Dirt・If you're in the lead during the\nOpening Leg and there's another girl right\nbehind you, she will slow down a little</size>
text.レース後半に息を入れたウマ娘を\\n萎縮させる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If an enemy character uses a recovery\nskill in the second half of the race,\nshe will slow down</size>
text.レース後半に息を入れたウマ娘を\\nわずかに萎縮させる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If an enemy character uses a recovery\nskill in the second half of the race,\nshe will slow down a little</size>
text.レース中間付近で先頭付近だと速度が\\n少しずつ上がる、ダートレースでは\\nさ:
<size=22>Halfway through the race, if you're near
the front, your speed will increase; if
this is a dirt race, you will also recover
stamina</size>
text.レース中盤に速度が上がる\\n＜作戦・先行＞: <size=22>Leader・At a random point in the Middle\nLeg, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース中盤に速度がわずかに上がる\\n＜作戦・先行＞: <size=22>Leader・At a random point in the Middle\nLeg, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース後半に前の方だと速度が上がり\\nさらに加速力がわずかに上がる\\nファン:
<size=22>In the second half of the race, if you're
not in the back of the pack, your speed
and acceleration will increase (scales
with the number of fans)</size>
text.レース後半に前の方だと速度がわずかに\\n上がり、加速力がほんのわずかに上がる\:
<size=22>In the second half of the race, if you're
not in the back of the pack, your speed
and acceleration will increase (scales
with the number of fans)</size>
text.ラストスパートの最終直線に中団以降で\\n速度を少しずつ上げ、効果中スキルを\\:
<size=22>During the Final Straight, if you're not
in the front, your speed will increase;
bonus speed for activating skills while
this is active (up to 3 times)</size>
text.レース終盤の最終コーナー後半で\\n高みを目指して中団から速度を上げる: <size=22>If you're in the middle of the pack during\nthe second half of the Final Corner in\nthe Final Leg, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース中盤に後方にいると速度が上がり\\nコース取りがうまくなる＜作戦・追込＞: <size=22>The description of this skill has recently\nchanged; retranslation is pending.</size>
text.レース中盤に後方にいると\\n速度がわずかに上がり、コース取りが\\nわずかにう: <size=22>The description of this skill has recently\nchanged; retranslation is pending.</size>
text.レース中盤始めの方に\\n持久力をすごく使って\\n速度をすごく上げる＜作戦・逃: <size=22>Runner・During the first half of the Middle\nLeg, use some stamina to greatly increase\nyour speed</size>
text.レース中盤始めの方に\\n持久力をすごく使って\\n速度を少し上げる＜作戦・逃げ: <size=22>Runner・During the first half of the Middle\nLeg, use some stamina to increase your\nspeed</size>
text.残り300mを切って先頭もしくは\\n前の方で先頭のウマ娘との距離が近いと\\n: <size=22>If you're close to the first place with\n300 m remaining in the race, your speed\nwill increase</size>
text.残り200ｍ地点で先頭ではないとき\\n先頭から4バ身以内だと速度が上がる\\n:
<size=22>With 200 meters remaining in the race,
your speed will increase if you're within
10 meters from the first place; it will
increase greatly if you're within 5 meters</size>
text.直線で速度が上がる＜短距離＞: <size=22>Short・At a random point on a random straight,\nyour speed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤に後方で追い抜こうとすると\\n加速力が上がる＜短距離/マイル＞:
<size=22>Short/Mile・If you're about to overtake
someone in the second half of the pack
during the Final Leg, your acceleration
will increase</size>
text.レース終盤に後方で追い抜こうとすると\\n加速力がわずかに上がる\\n＜短距離/:
<size=22>Short/Mile・If you're about to overtake
someone in the second half of the pack
during the Final Leg, your acceleration
will slightly increase</size>
text.中盤のコーナーで中団以降にいるとき\\n近くにウマ娘ちゃんが3人以上いると\\n:
<size=22>During any Middle Leg corner, if you're
not in the front and there are at least
three other uma musume-chan nearby, your
speed will increase with the power of
moe</size>
text.最終直線に入ったとき前の方だと速度を\\n上げ、前2人後ろ2人までの\\nウマ娘:
<size=22>If you're in front during the last straight,
your speed will increase, and you will
slow down two girls in front of you, and
two girls behind you</size>
text.前のウマ娘のすぐ後ろに付けると\\n速度が上がる: <size=22>If another girl has been right in front\nof you for at least three seconds, your\nspeed will increase</size>
text.残り400mを切って前の方で\\n詰め寄られるとファンの心に残る走りで\\n抜け:
<size=22>With less than 400 meters remaining, if
you're in the front and someone is about
to overtake you, your speed and acceleration
will increase</size>
text.レース前半で控え、最終コーナー後半に\\n前の方だと長時間加速力をちょっと上げ\:
<size=22>If you weren't ever in front until the
second half of the race, your acceleration
will increase during the second half of
the Final Corner; the effect is stronger
if you're in the 2nd place</size>
text.レース終盤目前、2番手以降に控えて\\n先頭から2バ身以内だとしばらくの間\\n: <size=22>Leader・During the latter part of the Middle\nLeg, if you're less than 5 meters away\nfrom the 1st place, your speed will increase</size>

<size=22>Leader・During the latter part of the Middle
Leg, if you're less than 5 meters away
from the 1st place, your speed will slightly
increase</size>
text.ラストスパートで中団以降にいると\\n持久力を少し使って加速力が上がる\\n＜差: <size=22>Betweener・Long・During the Last Spurt,\nif you're not in the front, use some stamina\nto increase your acceleration</size>
text.ラストスパートで中団以降にいると\\n持久力を少し使って加速力が\\nわずかに上: <size=22>Betweener・Long・During the Last Spurt,\nif you're not in the front, use some stamina\nto slightly increase your acceleration</size>
text.レース中盤にスキルを2つ発動すると\\n速度を少し上げ続ける、効果中スキルを\\:
<size=22>If you've activated at least 2 skills
during the Middle Leg, your speed will
increase; bonus speed for every extra
activation during the effect (max twice)</size>
text.終盤のコーナーで後方から詰め寄ると\\n最終直線で速度が上がる\\n終盤のコーナ:
<size=22>If you were in the back of the pack during
a Final Leg corner, your speed on the
last straight will increase depending
on the number of times you've overtaken
someone on the corner</size>
text.終盤が迫ったとき先頭にいるか\\n先頭から4バ身以内だと速度と加速力が\\n少し:
<size=22>Leader・Medium・If you're in lead or close
to the lead during the second half of
the Middle Leg, your speed and acceleration
will increase</size>
text.終盤が迫ったとき先頭にいるか\\n先頭から4バ身以内だと速度と加速力が\\nちょ:
<size=22>Leader・Medium・If you're in lead or close
to the lead during the second half of
the Middle Leg, your speed and acceleration
will slightly increase</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜こうと\\nしていた場合、残り400ｍを切ってから\\n:
<size=22>If you tried to overtake someone on the
Final Corner, and are in the middle of
the pack with at most 400 m remaining,
your speed will increase; bonus effect
if you're not popular</size>
text.レースでたまにさらなる力を発揮し\\nスピード、パワー、根性がすごく上がる\\n:
<size=22>Your Speed, Power, and Guts stats have
a chance of being increased by 80 each.
The chance is 30% if you're one of the
three most popular racers, and 60% otherwise</size>
text.レースでごくまれにさらなる力を発揮し\\nスピード、パワー、根性が少し上がる\\:
<size=22>Your Speed, Power, and Guts stats have
a chance of being increased by 40 each.
The chance is 30% if you're one of the
three most popular racers, and 60% otherwise</size>
text.残り300m地点で前の方にいると速度を\\n少し上げる、ダートレースで先頭の\\:
<size=22>With 300 meters remaining in the race,
if you're in a good position, your speed
will increase; if it's a dirt race and
you're close to the lead, you will also
immediately accelerate</size>
text.直線で速度が上がる\\n＜作戦・差し＞: <size=22>Betweener・At a random point on a random\nstraight, your speed will increase</size>
text.ラストスパートで速度が上がる\\n最も優れた基礎能力の高さに応じて\\n効果が高: <size=22>Increases speed during the Last Spurt\n(special scaling under investigation)</size>
text.ラストスパートで速度がわずかに上がる\\n最も優れた基礎能力の高さに応じて\\n: <size=22>Increases speed during the Last Spurt\n(special scaling under investigation)</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Your speed will slightly increase during\nthe second half of the Middle Leg</size>
text.ラストスパートで持久力を少し使い\\n速度が少し上がる: <size=22>During the Last Spurt, use a little stamina\nto increase your speed a little</size>
text.ラストスパートで追い越そうとすると\\nしばらくの間速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>If you try to overtake someone during\nthe Last Spurt, your speed will increase\na little</size>
text.追い比べをするとき\\n加速力がわずかに上がる: <size=22>If you participate in a Showdown, your\nacceleration will increase a little</size>
text.レース後半にスキルを2回発動させると\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>If you activate at least 2 skills in the\nsecond half of the race, your speed will\nincrease a little</size>
text.やる気が好調か絶好調だと\\nスタミナ、根性、賢さが\\n少し上がる場合がある: <size=22>Your Stamina, Guts, and Wisdom stats are\nincreased by 40 if your Motivation is\nGood or better</size>
text.レース中盤以降の下り坂で中団だと坂を\\n下った後少しの間速度を上げる\\n東京:
<size=22>After running downhill in the back of
the pack during the Middle Leg or later,
your speed will increase; if you're in
Tokyo, your acceleration will increase
too</size>
text.レース後半の直線で前の方にいると\\n速度を少し上げ続ける、さらに先頭で\\n後:
<size=22>If you're in front during any second half
straight, your speed will increase; bonus
speed if you're first and there's another
girl right behind you</size>
text.最終直線で2番手以降で\\n先頭から4バ身以内にいると\\n速度がすごく上がる＜:
<size=22>Betweener・On the final straight, if you're
not in lead but also not more than 10
meters from it, your speed will significantly
increase</size>
text.最終直線で2番手以降で\\n先頭から4バ身以内にいると\\n速度が少し上がる＜作: <size=22>Betweener・On the final straight, if you're\nnot in lead but also not more than 10\nmeters from it, your speed will increase</size>
text.最終直線で先頭のとき後ろ1バ身以内に\\nウマ娘がいると速度がすごく上がる\\n:
<size=22>Runner・If you're in the lead during the
final straight with another girl right
behind you, your speed will significantly
increase</size>
text.最終直線で先頭のとき後ろ1バ身以内に\\nウマ娘がいると速度が少し上がる\\n＜: <size=22>Runner・If you're in the lead during the\nfinal straight with another girl right\nbehind you, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース後半に追い抜こうとすると\\n速度が上がる＜先行/差し＞: <size=22>Leader/Betweener・If you try to overtake\nsomeone in the second half of the race,\nyour speed will increase</size>
text.レース後半に追い抜こうとすると\\n速度がわずかに上がる＜先行/差し＞: <size=22>Leader/Betweener・If you try to overtake\nsomeone in the second half of the race,\nyour speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース終盤目前に先頭か先頭から4バ身\\n以内につけると、レース終盤に加速力が\:
<size=22>Leader・Long・If you were within 10 meters
from the lead around the end of the Middle
Leg, then in the Final Leg, your acceleration
will slightly increase</size>
text.レース終盤の残り400m地点で前の方\\nだと速度が上がる、さらにGⅠなど\\n:
<size=22>With 400 meters remaining, if you're in
the front of the pack, your speed will
increase; the effect is stronger if it's
a big race (G1 or similar) and you're

text.終盤の最終コーナー後半に先団にいると\\n速度が上がる、長距離レースかつ中盤に\:
<size=22>If you're in front during the second half
of the Final Corner, your speed will increase;
bonus effect if it's a long race and you

text.レース終盤目前に先頭か先頭から4バ身\\n以内につけると、レース終盤に\\n加速:
<size=22>Leader・Long・If you were within 10 meters
from the lead around the end of the Middle
Leg, then in the Final Leg, your acceleration
will increase</size>
text.レース中間付近で中団にいるとき\\n燦然と輝きを放って速度が上がり\\nさらに持: <size=22>Halfway through the race, if you're in\nthe middle of the pack, your speed will\nincrease and your stamina recover</size>
text.終盤のコーナーで前の方にいる時\\nゴールまでが遠いと少しの間前に出て\\nさら:
<size=22>During a Final Leg corner where at least
600 meters remain, if you're in front

around(?) you</size>
text.レース中間付近以降の直線で中団に\\nいると速度を上げる、さらにそこが\\n下り:
<size=22>If you're in the middle of the pack during
any straight after the middle of the race,
your speed will increase; bonus duration
if you're running downhill</size>
text.レース後半のどこかで前に出て\\n持久力をわずかに回復する: <size=22>At a random point in the second half of\nthe race, you will get a speed boost and\nyour stamina will slightly recover</size>
text.レース後半のどこかでわずかに前に出て\\n持久力をほんのわずかに回復する:
<size=22>At a random point in the second half of
the race, you will get a slight speed
boost and your stamina will marginally
recover</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき後方にいると\\n速度が上がる＜長距離＞: <size=22>Long・If you're in the second half of the\npack during the second half of the Middle\nLeg, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき後方にいると\\n速度がわずかに上がる＜長距離＞: <size=22>Long・If you're in the second half of the\npack during the second half of the Middle\nLeg, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.ラストスパートで中団以降にいると\\n持久力を少し使って加速力を上げる\\n中山:
<size=22>Betweener・Long・Increase your acceleration
by slightly using stamina during the second
half of the Last Spurt, or recover instead
of using stamina on the Nakayama Racetrack</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき後方にいると\\n速度が上がり持久力をわずかに\\n回復す:
<size=22>Medium/Long・If you're in the second half
of the pack during the second half of
the Middle Leg, your speed will increase
and your stamina will slightly recover</size>
text.レース中盤に競り合っていた場合\\n残り650m地点で好位置にいると\\n夢を叶:
<size=22>If you were blocked from the side during
the Middle Leg, then with 650 m remaining
in the race, if you're in a good position,
your acceleration will increase</size>
text.終盤の最終直線で好位置にいるとき\\n後ろのウマ娘と近いと\\n持久力を使って速:
<size=22>During the last straight of the Final
Leg, if there are other girls closely
behind you while you're in a good position,
use extra stamina to increase your speed
and get a slight speed boost</size>
text.レース中盤に持久力を回復し\\nさらに速度が少し上がる＜長距離＞: <size=22>Long・At a random point during the Middle\nLeg, your speed will slightly increase\nand your stamina will recover</size>
text.レース中盤に持久力を\\nわずかに回復しさらに速度が\\nちょっと上がる＜長距離: <size=22>Long・At a random point during the Middle\nLeg, your speed will marginally increase\nand your stamina will slightly recover</size>
text.レース中盤に中団で競り合うと\\n持久力が回復し\\nさらに速度が上がる＜中距離:
<size=22>Medium・If you're in the middle of the
pack during the Middle Leg and someone
is blocking you from the side, your speed
will increase and your stamina will recover</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき持久力を回復し\\n速度がわずかに上がる＜作戦・先行＞: <size=22>Leader・During the second half of the Middle\nLeg, your speed will slightly increase\nand your stamina will recover</size>
text.終盤の最終直線で、持久力を少し\\n使い、速度がものすごく上がる\\n＜先行・中: <size=22>Leader・Medium・On the Final Straight during\nthe Final Leg, use a little extra stamina\nto tremendously increase your speed</size>
text.レース中間地点で中団にいると速度を\\n少し上げる、長距離レースだと効果時間\\:
<size=22>If you are in the middle of the pack during
the middle of the race, your speed will
slightly increase; in a long-distance
race, this effect will last longer and
stamina will greatly recover</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で\\n余力十分なら前に出る\\n＜差し・長距離＞: <size=22>Betweener・Long・If you have surplus strength\nduring the first half of the Final Leg,\nyour speed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で\\n余力十分ならわずかに前に出る\\n＜差し・長距離＞: <size=22>Betweener・Long・If you have surplus strength\nduring the first half of the Final Leg,\nyour speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で\\n余力十分ならすごく前に出る\\n＜差し・長距離＞: <size=22>Betweener・Long・If you have surplus strength\nduring the first half of the Final Leg,\nyour speed will greatly increase</size>
text.レース中間付近で中団にいると\\n速度が上がる、中距離レースで7回以上\\nスキ:
<size=22>If you're in the middle of the pack halfway
through the race, your speed will increase;
bonus speed if it's a Medium-distance
race and you've activated at least 7 skills</size>
text.レース中にスキルを13回発動すると\\n前に出る＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・If you've activated at least 13\nskills in the race, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース中にスキルを13回発動すると\\nわずかに前に出る＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・If you've activated at least 13\nskills in the race, your speed will slightly\nincrease</size>
text.レース中にスキルを13回発動すると\\nしばらくの間前に出る＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・If you've activated at least 13\nskills in the race, your speed will increase</size>
text.残り400m地点で3番手以内にいると\\n短い間加速力がちょっと上がる\\nレー: <size=22>The description of this skill has recently\nchanged; retranslation is pending.</size>
text.レース後半のコーナーで中団にいると\\n残り持久力に応じた時間\\n速度が少し上:
<size=22>If you're in the middle of the pack during
any corner in the second half of the race,
your speed will slightly increase; in
Medium races, your acceleration will also
slightly increase</size>
text.レース序盤にスキルを多く発動すると\\n加速力が上がる: <size=22>If you've activated at least 3 skills\nduring the Opening Leg, your acceleration\nwill increase</size>
text.レース中盤が迫ったとき\\n中団以降にいると速度がわずかに上がる\\n＜作戦・差: <size=22>Betweener・If you're not in the front during\nthe second half of the Opening Leg, your\nspeed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき\\n中団以降にいると速度がわずかに上がる\\n＜作戦・差: <size=22>Betweener・If you're not in the front during\nthe second half of the Middle Leg, your\nspeed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき前方にいると\\n速度がすごく上がる＜短距離＞: <size=22>Short・If you're in the first half of the\npack during the second half of the Middle\nLeg, your speed will greatly increase</size>
text.レース中盤始めの方で\\n持久力をすごく回復する\\n＜作戦・差し＞: <size=22>Betweener・During the first half of the\nMiddle Leg, your stamina will greatly\nrecover</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で中団以降にいると\\nしばらくの間加速力が上がる＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・During the first half of the Final\nLeg, if you're not in the front, your\nacceleration will increase</size>
text.最終コーナー後半で中団にいると速度を\\n少し上げ続ける、さらに長距離レースで\:
<size=22>During the second half of the Final Corner,
if you're in the middle of the pack, your
speed will increase; the effect is stronger
if it's a long race and you're 4th or
less popular</size>
text.レース中盤に中団にいると\\nしばらくの間速度が少し上がる\\n＜作戦・差し＞: <size=22>Betweener・If you're in the middle of the\npack at a random point during the Middle\nLeg, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース中盤に中団にいると\\nしばらくの間速度がちょっと上がる\\n＜作戦・差し: <size=22>Betweener・If you're in the middle of the\npack at a random point during the Middle\nLeg, your speed will marginally increase</size>
text.絶好調なら全ての基礎能力が上がり\\nレース中常にスキルの不利な効果を\\n受け:
<size=22>If your motivation is Perfect, your acceleration
will permanently marginally increase,
you will get a bonus of 60 to all base
stats, and you will become immune to debuffs</size>
text.天候が晴れでバ場状態が良のとき\\n全ての基礎能力がすごく上がり\\nレース中常:
<size=22>If it's sunny and the track condition
is good, your acceleration will permanently
marginally increase, and you will get
a bonus of 80 to all base stats</size>
text.天候が雨でバ場状態が不良のとき\\nスピードとスタミナがものすごく上がり\\nレ:
<size=22>If it's raining and the track condition
is bad, your acceleration will permanently
slightly increase, and you will get a
bonus of 100 to Speed and Stamina stats</size>
text.枠番が1～3だとスタート後しばらくの\\n間速度と加速力を少し上げ、さらに終盤\:
<size=22>If you've started the race in gate block
1, 2, or 3, your speed and acceleration
will slightly increase at the start, and
then during the Final Leg, your acceleration
will slightly increase and your stamina
will recover</size>
text.枠番が6～8だとスピードとスタミナ、\\nパワーがものすごく上がり\\nさらに終:
<size=22>If you've started the race in gate block
6, 7, or 8, you will get a bonus of 100
to Speed, Stamina, and Power, and then
during the Final Leg, your acceleration
will slightly increase</size>
text.チームのスキル発動数が6以上だと終盤\\nに加速力を少し上げ持久力を回復する\\:
<size=22>During the Final Leg, if your team has
activated at least 6 skills combined during
the race, your acceleration will increase
and your stamina will recover; bonus effect
if the skill count is 10 or more</size>
text.レース終盤すぐにすごく前に出て\\n持久力を回復し加速力をちょっと上げる: <size=22>During the Final Leg, your acceleration\nwill slightly increase, you'll get a great\nspeed boost, and your stamina will recover</size>
text.レース中盤に中団以降にいると\\n持久力をすごく回復する\\n＜作戦・差し＞: <size=22>Betweener・At a random point during the\nMiddle Leg, if you're not in the front,\nyour stamina will greatly recover</size>
text.レース中盤に中団にいると\\nしばらくの間速度が上がる\\n＜作戦・差し＞: <size=22>Betweener・If you're in the middle of the\npack at a random point during the Middle\nLeg, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤に後方にいると最終直線で\\n力を解放し前に出る、東京レース場の\\n:
<size=22>If you were in the second half of the
pack during the Final Leg or beyond, then
on the Final Straight, your speed will
increase; the effect is stronger in medium
Tokyo races</size>
text.スピードとパワーが十分に強いと\\nスピードとパワーが上がる\\n＜マイル/中距: <size=22>Mile/Medium・If your base Speed and Power\nare both at least 1000, they will increase\nby additional 60 points</size>
text.スピードとパワーが十分に強いと\\nスピードとパワーがわずかに上がる\\n＜マイ: <size=22>Mile/Medium・If your base Speed and Power\nare both at least 1000, they will increase\nby additional 20 points</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方に中団にいると\\n前に出る＜中距離/長距離＞: <size=22>Medium/Long・If you're in the middle of\nthe pack during the first half of the\nFinal Leg, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方に中団にいると\\nわずかに前に出る＜中距離/長距離＞: <size=22>Medium/Long・If you're in the middle of\nthe pack during the first half of the\nFinal Leg, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.スピードとパワーが十分に強いと\\nスピードとパワーがすごく上がる\\n＜マイル: <size=22>Mile/Medium・If your base Speed and Power\nare both at least 1000, they will increase\nby additional 80 points</size>
text.レース中盤に3回追い抜いた場合\\n終盤目前の下り坂で後方にいると\\n少しの間:
<size=22>If you overtook someone at least three
times during the Middle Leg but you are
still in the second half of the pack during
any downhill around the end of the Middle
Leg, your speed will increase and your
accelearation will slightly increase</size>
text.残り200m地点で2番手～中団\\nにいると速度が上がる\\n近くにウマ娘が3人:
<size=22>With 200 meters remaining in the race,
if you're not in the lead but also not
in the back of the pack, your speed will
increase; if there are at 3 other girls
around you, you will also get an speed
boost</size>
text.コーナーで速度が上がる＜マイル＞: <size=22>Mile・At a random point on a random corner,\nyour speed will increase</size>
text.レース中盤に後方にいると\\nしばらくの間速度が上がる\\n＜作戦・追込＞: <size=22>Chaser・If you're in the second half of\nthe pack at a random point during the\nMiddle Leg, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤突入時まで掛からずにいると\\n終盤始めの方でしばらくの間\\n加速力:
<size=22>Chaser・Medium・If you don't panic (kakari)
for the first 2/3 of the race, your acceleration
will increase in the first half of the
Final Leg</size>
text.コーナーで速度がすごく上がり\\nさらに自身を除くチームメンバーの\\n速度がわ: <size=22>Mile・At a random point on a random corner,\nyour speed will increase, and you will\nslightly increase speed of all your teammates</size>
text.下り坂で速度が上がり\\nさらに加速力がわずかに上がる\\n＜短距離/マイル＞: <size=22>Short/Mile・At a random point on a random\ndownhill, your speed and acceleration\nwill increase</size>
text.レース中間付近で中団にいるとき\\n近くにウマ娘がいると速度が上がる\\n視界に:
<size=22>If you're in the middle of the pack around
halfway through the race and there's another
girl nearby, your speed will increase;
bonus speed if there are at least 4 other
girls in your FoV</size>
text.レース中盤に後ろの方にいると\\n速度がすごく上がる＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・If you're in the second half of\nthe pack at a random point during the\nMiddle Leg, your speed will greatly increase</size>
text.ラストスパートで前が塞がれた時\\n加速力が上がりコース取りが少し\\nうまくな:
<size=22>If there's another girl right in front
of you during the Last Spurt, your acceleration
and lane movement speed will increase;
if there's at least 600 remaining, you
will also get a speed boost</size>
text.レース中間付近で中団にいると\\n速度を少し上げ続ける\\n絶好調なら効果が増え: <size=22>If you're in the middle of the pack halfway\nthrough the race, your speed will increase;\nbonus speed if you're fully motivated</size>
text.残り200m地点で前の方にいると速度が\\n少し上がる、短距離レースで終盤に\\:
<size=22>If you're in the first half of the pack
(but not in the lead) with 200 m remaining,
your speed will increase; bonus speed
if the race is Short and you've overtaken
someone since entering the Final Leg</size>
text.夏のレースが得意になり\\nスピードとパワーが上昇する: <size=22>Your Speed and Power stats are increased\nby 60 in summer races</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で前方にいると\\n加速力が上がる＜マイル＞: <size=22>Mile・If you're in the first half of the\npack during the first half of the Final\nLeg, your acceleration will increase</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で前方にいると\\n加速力がわずかに上がる＜マイル＞: <size=22>Mile・If you're in the first half of the\npack during the first half of the Final\nLeg, your acceleration will slightly increase</size>
text.レース中盤に速度が上がり\\nさらに持久力を少し回復する\\n＜長距離＞: <size=22>Long・At a random point during the Middle\nLeg, your speed will increase and your\nstamina will slightly recover</size>
text.レース中盤に速度がわずかに上がり\\nさらに持久力をちょっと回復する\\n＜長距: <size=22>Long・At a random point during the Middle\nLeg, your speed will slightly increase\nand your stamina will marginally recover</size>
text.最終コーナーで中団以降にいると\\n加速力が上がる、東京レース場なら\\nさらに:
<size=22>Medium・At a random point during the Final
Corner, if you're not in the front, your
acceleration will increase; in Tokyo,
your speed will also slightly increase</size>
text.最終コーナーで中団だと速度が上がる\\n東京レース場の中距離レースならさらに\\:
<size=22>Betweener・At a random point during the
Final Corner, if you're in the middle
of the pack, your speed will increase;
in Medium races in Tokyo, your acceleration
will also slightly increase</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方に中団以降にいると\\n加速力が上がり、その後残り200m地点:
<size=22>Betweener・During the first half of the
Final Leg, if you're not in the front,
your acceleration will increase; then,
when there's 200 m remaining in the race,
your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース終盤に加速力が上がり\\nその後残り200m地点で\\n速度がわずかに上が:
<size=22>Short・At a random point during the Final
Leg, your acceleration will increase;
then, when there's 200 m remaining in
the race, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.第3コーナーで先頭なら速度を少し上げ\\n持久力を少し回復する、東京の\\n中距:
<size=22>If you're in the lead during the third
corner, your speed will slightly increase
and your stamina will slightly recover;
bonus duration in Medium Tokyo races</size>
text.レース中盤に大きく差をつけて先頭に\\nいたとき、最終直線で先頭だと速度が\\n:
<size=22>Runner・If anytime during the Middle Leg
you were in the lead by at least 3 lengths,
then if you're in the lead on the Final
Straight, your speed will increase; in
Medium Tokyo races, it will increase tremendously</size>
text.残り800m地点で中団にいると加速力が\\nわずかに上がる、2400ｍのレースで:
<size=22>With 800 meters remaining in the race,
if you're in the middle of the pack, your
acceleration will slightly increase; it
will increase greatly if the race is 2400
m long and you're top 3 in popularity</size>
text.終盤突入時に先頭だと少し前に出る\\nそこが第3コーナーで中盤に大きく差を\\n:
<size=22>If you're in the first place two-thirds
through the race, you will get a speed
boost; the effect will greatly increase
if the two-thirds point is on the third
corner and if you were leading by at least
3 lengths during the Middle Leg</size>
text.後半のコーナーで好位置だと少しの間\\n速度をすごく上げる、中山レース場なら\\:
<size=22>If you're in a good position on any corner
during the second half of the race, your
speed will greatly increase; in Nakayama,
your acceleration will also slightly increase</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき\\n中団以降にいると速度が上がる\\n＜作戦・差し＞: <size=22>Betweener・If you're not in the front during\nthe second half of the Middle Leg, your\nspeed will increase</size>
text.スタート時に加速力が上がる\\n＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・At the start of the race, your\nacceleration will increase</size>
text.スタート時に加速力がわずかに上がる\\n＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・At the start of the race, your\nacceleration will slightly increase</size>
text.スピードが十二分に高いとスピードが\\n上がる、賢さも十二分ならスピードが\\n:
<size=22>Leader・Medium・If your Speed stat is at
least 1200, it will further increase by
60; bonus 20 Speed if your Wisdom is also
at least 1200</size>
text.スピードが十二分に高いとスピードが\\nわずかに上がる、賢さも十二分なら\\nス:
<size=22>Leader・Medium・If your Speed stat is at
least 1200, it will further increase by
20; bonus 20 Speed if your Wisdom is also
at least 1200</size>
text.レース中盤に前の方にいると\\n速度がすごく上がる\\n＜作戦・逃げ＞: <size=22>Runner・If you're in the first half of\nthe pack at a random point during the\nMiddle Leg, your speed will greatly increase</size>
text.スタート時に加速力がすごく上がる\\n＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・At the start of the race, your\nacceleration will greatly increase</size>
text.スピードが十二分に高いとスピードが\\nすごく上がる、賢さも十二分ならスピー\\:
<size=22>Leader・Medium・If your Speed stat is at
least 1200, it will further increase by
80; bonus 20 Speed if your Wisdom is also
at least 1200</size>
text.レース中盤に速度が上がる\\nスピードの能力に応じて効果が増える\\n＜作戦・先: <size=22>Leader・At a random point in the Middle\nLeg, your speed will increase; [bonus\neffect under investigation]</size>
text.レース終盤目前で好位置にいた場合\\n残り400m地点で速度がすごく上がる\\n:
<size=22>If you were in a good position around
the end of the Middle Leg, then with 400
m remaining in the race, your speed will
greatly increase; it will increase tremendously
if the race is Long and you're within
2.5 m from the lead</size>
text.終盤の最終コーナーで中団以前にいる時\\nゴールまで遠いと加速力が上がる\\n＜:
<size=22>Leader/Betweener・If you're on the final
corner in the Final Leg, you're not in
the back of the pack, and there's at least
600 m remaining in the race, your acceleration
will greatly increase</size>
text.終盤の最終コーナーで中団以前にいる時\\nゴールまで遠いと加速力がわずかに\\n:
<size=22>Leader/Betweener・If you're on the final
corner in the Final Leg, you're not in
the back of the pack, and there's at least
600 m remaining in the race, your acceleration
will slightly increase</size>
text.レース中盤のコーナーで\\nしばらくの間速度が少し上がる: <size=22>During a random Middle Leg corner, your\nspeed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース中盤のコーナーで\\nしばらくの間速度がちょっと上がる: <size=22>During a random Middle Leg corner, your\nspeed will marginally increase</size>
text.ロンシャンレース場が得意になる: <size=22>At Longchamp, your Stamina stat is increased\nby 60</size>
text.ロンシャンレース場が少し得意になる: <size=22>At Longchamp, your Stamina stat is increased\nby 40</size>
text.ロンシャンレース場が少し苦手になる: <size=22>At Longchamp, your Stamina stat is decreased\nby 40</size>
text.ロンシャンレース場が得意になり\\nスタミナ、賢さ、スピードが上昇する: <size=22>At Longchamp, your Speed, Stamina, and\nWisdom stats are increased by 60</size>
text.最終直線で速度が上がる\\n獲得した海外適性Lvの合計が高いほど\\n効果が高ま: <size=22>During the Final Straight, your speed\nis increased depending on the cumulative\nlevel of your Overseas Aptitudes</size>
text.最終直線で速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>During the Final Straight, your speed\nwill slightly increase</size>
text.パワーとスピードが少し上がる\\n「良」のバ場状態ならすごく上がる\\n＜芝＞:
<size=22>On Turf tracks in Good condition, your
Speed and Power stats are increased by
80; on Turf tracks in other conditions,
they're increased by 40</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき前方にいると\\n速度が上がる、その後ラストスパートで\\:
<size=22>Long・During the second half of the Middle
Leg, if you're in the first half of the
pack, your speed will increase; then during
the Last Spurt, your acceleration will
slightly increase</size>
text.中距離か長距離レースで最終コーナー\\n以降に後方から追い抜こうとすると\\n速:
<size=22>Medium/Long・During the Final Corner or
beyond, if you're about to overtake someone
from the second half of the pack, your
speed will increase; it will increase
greatly if you had a late start</size>
text.「稍重」「重」「不良」のバ場状態が\\n得意になりパワーとスピードが上昇する: <size=22>Your Power and Speed stat is increased\nby 60 in races with Slightly Heavy, Heavy,\nor Bad track condition</size>
text.ラストスパートの直線で加速力が上がる\\nその後最終直線で速度がわずかに上がる\:
<size=22>Chaser・During any Last Spurt straight,
your acceleration will increase; then,
during the Last Straight, your speed will
slightly increase</size>
text.「稍重」「重」「不良」のバ場状態が\\n得意になりパワーとスピードが\\nすごく:
<size=22>On tracks in Slightly Heavy, Heavy, or
Bad condition, your Speed and Power stats
are increased by 80, but your race start
will be slower</size>
text.終盤が迫ったときどこかで中団にいると\\n速度が少し上がる、中距離レースなら\\:
<size=22>During the second half of the Middle Leg,
if you're around the middle of the pack,
your speed will slightly increase; bonus
speed if the race is Medium</size>
text.コーナーで速度がすごく上がる、さらに\\nロンシャンレース場で絶好調なら\\n効:
<size=22>Medium・At a random point on a random corner,
your speed will greatly increase; bonus
duration if your motivation is Perfect
at the Longchamp racetrack</size>
text.終盤始めのどこかで前方にいると\\n少し前に出る、短距離かマイル\\nレースの場:
<size=22>During the first half of the Final Leg,
if you're in a good position, you will
get a speed boost; the effect is stronger
in Short and Mile races</size>
text.コーナーで速度が上がる\\n＜作戦・追込＞: <size=22>Chaser・At a random point on a random corner,\nyour speed will increase</size>
text.最終コーナーで前の方にいると\\n速度が上がる、さらに短距離レースなら\\nわず:
<size=22>Leader・At a random point on the Final
Corner, if you're in the first half of
the pack, your speed will increase; in
Short races, you will also get a slight
speed boost</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で前方にいると\\n加速力が上がり、その後残り200m地点\\:
<size=22>Leader・During the first half of the Final
Leg, if you're in the first half of the
pack, your acceleration will increase;
then, when there's 200 m remaining in
the race, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.終盤の最終コーナー後半以降に\\n追い抜こうとすると速度が上がる\\nレース中盤:
<size=22>If you try to overtake someone during
the second half of the Final Corner or
later, your speed will increase; the effect
will be stronger if someone previously
overtook you from the middle of the pack
during the Middle Leg</size>
text.レース中間地点で中団にいると最終直線\\nで速度が上がる、中山レース場の\\n中:
<size=22>If you were in the middle of the pack
halfway through the race, then during
the Last Straight, your speed will increase;
the effect is stronger in Medium Nakayama
races</size>
text.レース中盤に持久力をすごく回復する\\n＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・At a random point during the Middle\nLeg, your stamina will greatly recover</size>
text.レース中盤で持久力を回復し\\n前5人までのウマ娘の\\n持久力をわずかに削る＜:
<size=22>Long・At a random point during the Middle
Leg, you will drain stamina from enemy
girls ahead of you, and your own stamina
will recover</size>
text.レース終盤にしばらくの間\\n前に出る＜作戦・追込＞: <size=22>Chaser・At a random point during the Final\nLeg, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース中盤に前の方にいると\\n持久力をわずかに回復し速度が上がる\\n＜作戦・:
<size=22>Leader・If you're in the first half of
the pack at a random point during the
Middle Leg, your speed will increase and
your stamina will slightly recover</size>
text.レース中盤に中団で競り合うと持久力が\\n少し回復し、さらに速度がすごく上がり\:
<size=22>Medium・If you're in the middle of the
pack during the Middle Leg and someone
is blocking you from the side, your speed
will increase, your stamina will slightly
recover, and you will slightly increase
the speed of all your teammates</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方に中団以降にいると\\nしばらくの間加速力が上がる\\n＜差し: <size=22>Betweener・Medium・During the first half\nof the Final Leg, if you're not in the\nfront, your acceleration will increase</size>
text.残り1000ｍ地点で前の方にいると\\n速度が上がる: <size=22>If you're in the first half of the pack\n(but not in the lead) with 1000 m remaining,\nyour speed will increase</size>
text.最終コーナー前の第3コーナーで\\n前の方にいると前に出る\\n＜マイル/中距離: <size=22>Mile/Medium・If you're in the first half\nof the pack during the 3rd corner, your\nspeed will increase</size>
text.最終コーナー前の第3コーナーで\\n前の方にいるとわずかに前に出る\\n＜マイル: <size=22>Mile/Medium・If you're in the first half\nof the pack during the 3rd corner, your\nspeed will slightly increase</size>
text.最終コーナー前の第3コーナーで\\n前の方にいるとすごく前に出る\\n＜マイル/: <size=22>Mile/Medium・If you're in the first half\nof the pack during the 3rd corner, your\nspeed will greatly increase</size>
text.レース中盤にしばらくの間速度が上がる\\n＜マイル/中距離＞: <size=22>Mile/Medium・At a random point during the\nMiddle Leg, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース中盤以降の上り坂で中団にいると\\n坂を上りきった後、優雅にぶちかまして\:
<size=22>If you run uphill during the Middle Leg
or later while being in the middle of
the pack, then after the finishing the
hill, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース後半に前の方で詰め寄られると\\n終盤の最終コーナー後半以降で速度が\\n:
<size=22>If someone tried to overtake you in the
first half of the pack during the second
half of the race, then during the second
half of the Final Corner, your speed will
increase; you will also get a speed boost
in races between 2400 and 2500 m long</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき中団以降だと\\n速度が上がる＜短距離＞: <size=22>Short・If you're not near the front during\nthe second half of the Middle Leg, your\nspeed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき中団以降だと\\n速度がわずかに上がる＜短距離＞: <size=22>Short・If you're not near the front during\nthe second half of the Middle Leg, your\nspeed will slightly increase</size>
text.終盤始めの方に前の方にいると加速力が\\n上がる、2400m～2500mのレース:
<size=22>Leader・During the first half of the Final
Leg, if you're in the first half of the
pack, your acceleration will increase;
it will increase greatly if the race is
bewteen 2400 and 2500 m long and you have
a lot of Stamina</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき前の方にいると\\n持久力を少し回復し速度が少し上がる\\:
<size=22>Leader・If you're in the first half of
the pack during the second half of the
Middle Leg, your speed will increase and
your stamina will recover</size>
text.レース中盤に持久力をわずかに回復し\\n速度が上がる＜作戦・先行＞: <size=22>Leader・At a random point during the Middle\nLeg, your speed will increase and your\nstamina will slightly recover</size>
text.レース中盤に後方にいると\\n持久力を少し回復し速度がすごく上がる\\n＜中距離:
<size=22>Medium・If you're in the second half of
the pack at a random point in the Middle
Leg, your speed will greatly increase
and your stamina will recover</size>
text.下り坂で速度が上がり\\nさらに加速力がわずかに上がる\\n＜マイル/中距離＞: <size=22>Mile/Medium・At a random point on a random\ndownhill, your speed and acceleration\nwill increase</size>
text.レース終盤にしばらくの間少し前に出る: <size=22>At a random point in the Final Leg, you\nwill get a slight speed boost</size>
text.レース中盤が迫ったとき\\n中団以降にいると持久力をわずかに\\n回復し速度が上:
<size=22>Betweener・During the second half of the
Opening Leg, if you're not in the front,
your speed will increase and your stamina
will slightly recover</size>
text.レース中盤に前の方にいると\\nしばらくの間速度が少し上がる\\n＜作戦・先行＞: <size=22>Leader・If you're in the first half of\nthe pack at a random point in the Middle\nLeg, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース中盤に前の方にいると\\nしばらくの間速度がちょっと上がる\\n＜作戦・先: <size=22>Leader・If you're in the first half of\nthe pack at a random point in the Middle\nLeg, your speed will marginally increase</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方早めに\\n前の方にいると加速力がわずかに上がる\\n＜先行・: <size=22>Leader・Long・If you're in the first half\nof the pack around the start of the Final\nLeg, your acceleration will slightly increase</size>
text.終盤の最終直線で先頭にいると速度が\\n少し上がる、終盤開始までに取った\\nリ: <size=22>If you're in the lead during the final\nstraight, your speed will slightly increase\n(special scaling under investigation)</size>
text.レース中盤に速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>At a random point during the Middle Leg,\nyour speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース中盤が迫ったとき\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>During the second half of the Opening\nLeg, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース中盤に先頭にいると\\n速度がすごく上がる\\n＜作戦・逃げ＞: <size=22>Runner・If you're in the lead at a random\npoint during the Middle Leg, your speed\nwill greatly increase</size>
text.レース中盤にスキルを多く発動して\\n先頭にいるとき速度がすごく上がる: <size=22>If you've activated at least 3 skills\nduring the Middle Leg and you're currently\nin the lead, your speed will greatly increase</size>
text.レース中間付近以降の直線で先頭だと\\n長めに速度を少し上げ続ける、さらに\\n:
<size=22>If you're in the lead on any straight
in the last 60% of the race, your speed
will slightly increase; if you're in Nakayama
and you've activated the Great Escape
skill, your acceleration will also slightly
increase</size>
text.中盤に中団にいるとき速度をわずかに\\n落として、持久力をすごく回復する\\nス:
<size=22>If you're in the middle of the pack during
the Middle Leg, your stamina will greatly
recover but your speed will slightly decrease;
then, during the Final Leg, if your Stamina
stat is at least 1200, you will get a
slight speed boost</size>
text.冬のレースが得意になり\\nスピードとパワーが上昇する: <size=22>Your Speed and Power stats are increased\nby 60 in winter races</size>
text.レース中盤に後ろの方にいると\\n速度がすごく上がる＜長距離＞: <size=22>Long・If you're in the second half of the\npack at a random point during the Middle\nLeg, your speed will greatly increase</size>
text.レース中盤にコーナーにいるとき\\n持久力をわずかに回復し\\n速度が上がる＜長: <size=22>Long・During any Middle Leg corner, your\nspeed will increase and your stamina will\nslightly recover</size>
text.レース中盤に中団以降で\\n速度が少し上がり持久力を少し回復する\\n＜作戦・差:
<size=22>Betweener・At a random point during the
Middle Leg, if you're not in the front,
your speed will increase and your stamina
will slightly recover</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で前方にいると\\n加速力が上がる、その後最終直線で\\n速度:
<size=22>Leader・During the first half of the Final
Leg, if you're in the first half of the
pack, your acceleration will increase;
then, on the Last Straight, your speed
will slightly increase</size>
text.直線でしばらくの間速度が上がる\\n＜長距離＞: <size=22>Long・At a random point on a random straight,\nyour speed will increase</size>
text.レース中盤に速度がすごく上がり\\nさらに持久力を少し回復する\\n中山レース場:
<size=22>Great Escape・Long・At a random point during
the Middle Leg, your speed will greatly
increase and your stamina will slightly
recover; bonus stamina recovery if you're
in Nakayama and your motivation is Perfect</size>
text.レース中盤にしばらくの間\\n速度が少し上がる\\nスタミナが十二分に高いと\\:
<size=22>Betweener・At a random point during the
Middle Leg, your speed will slightly increase;
bonus duration if your Stamina stat is
at least 1200</size>
text.レース終盤で追い抜くと\\nしばらくの間前に出る\\nスタミナが十二分に高いと\:
<size=22>Long・If you overtake someone during the
Final Leg, your speed will increase; bonus
duration if your stamina Stat is at least
1200</size>
text.最終コーナーで中団にいた場合\\n残り400mを切ってから速度が上がる\\n中距:
<size=22>If you were in the middle of the pack
during the Final Corner, then with 400
m remaining the in race, your speed will
increase; bonus speed if the race is Medium
distance and you overtook someone during
the Middle Leg</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で中団以降にいると\\n加速力が上がる、2200m～2400m:
<size=22>Medium・During the first half of the Final
Leg, if you're not in the front, your
acceleration will increase; in races between
2200 and 2400 m long, your acceleration
will increase greatly, but you will use
a little extra stamina</size>
text.レース中間付近で前の方にいると速度が\\n上がりさらに持久力がわずかに回復する\:
<size=22>Around the middle of the race, if you're
near the front but not leading, your speed
will increase and your stamina will slightly
recover; bonus stamina recovery in races
of at least 2400 m</size>
text.終盤が迫ったとき前の方にいると速度が\\n少し上がり、加速力が少し上がる\\n2:
<size=22>Leader・Medium・If you're in the first half
of the pack during the second half of
the Middle Leg, your speed and acceleration
will increase; bonus speed in 2400 m races</size>
text.序・中盤に前の方で追い抜かれるか競り\\n合ったとき短い間速度を上げる、その後\:
<size=22>During the Opening or Middle Leg, if you
were overtaken or blocked from the side
for at least two seconds, your speed will
increase; (Long only) then, if you're
in the front in the second half of the
race, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で\\n余力十分なら前に出る\\n＜逃げ・長距離＞: <size=22>Runner・Long・If you have enough stamina\nleft in the first half of the Final Leg,\nyou will get a speed boost</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で\\n余力十分ならわずかに前に出る\\n＜逃げ・長距離＞: <size=22>Runner・Long・If you have enough stamina\nleft in the first half of the Final Leg,\nyou will get a small speed boost</size>
text.ラストスパートの直線で前の方だと\\n加速力が上がる＜逃げ・長距離＞: <size=22>Runner・Long・If you're in the front during\nany last spurt straight, your acceleration\nwill increase</size>
text.ラストスパートの直線で前の方だと\\n加速力がわずかに上がる\\n＜逃げ・長距離: <size=22>Runner・Long・If you're in the front during\nany last spurt straight, your acceleration\nwill slightly increase</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜いていると\\n残り200m地点で速度がすごく上がる\\:
<size=22>Medium・If you overtook someone during
the Final Corner, then when there's 200
m remaining in the race, your speed will
greatly increase</size>
text.レース終盤にしばらくの間少し前に出る\\n芝のレースでは効果が増える＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・At a random point during the Final\nLeg, you will get a speed boost; the effect\nis slightly stronger on turf</size>
text.スピードとパワーが少し上がる\\nさらに「重」か「不良」のバ場状態なら\\n全て:
<size=22>Dirt・Your Speed and Power stats are increased
by 40; in races with Heavy or Bad track
condition, you will get an additional
20 points to all base stats</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で余力十分なら前に\\n出る、その後最終直線でわずかに\\n前:
<size=22>Runner・Long・If you have enough stamina
left in the first half of the Final Leg,
you will get a speed boost; then, during
the Final Straight, you will get another
speed boost</size>
text.ラストスパートの直線で前の方だと\\n加速力が上がる、その後最終直線で\\nわず:
<size=22>Runner・Long・If you're in the front during
any last spurt straight, your acceleration
will increase; then, during the Final
Straight, you will get a speed boost</size>
text.レース終盤に最終コーナー以降で\\n追い抜こうとするとしばらくの間\\n前に出る: <size=22>Medium・During the Final Corner, if you're\nabout to overtake someone, you will get\na speed boost</size>
text.終盤の最終コーナー以降で中団以降だと\\n少しの間速度がすごく上がる\\n中距離:
<size=22>If you're not in the front on the Final
Corner during the Final Leg, your speed
will greatly increase; in Middle distance
races, you will receive a great instant
speed boost instead</size>
text.前のウマ娘のすぐ後ろに付けると\\n速度がすごく上がる: <size=22>If another girl has been right in front\nof you for at least three seconds, your\nspeed will greatly increase</size>
text.レース終盤の最終直線に入ったとき\\n中団にいると残り300ｍを切ってから\\n:
<size=22>If you entered the Final Straight in the
middle of the pack, then when there's
300 m remaining in the race, your speed
will increase; it will increase greatly
if you didn't panic (kakari) during the
race</size>
text.レース中盤にスキルを発動すると\\n速度が少し上がる\\nその後レース終盤にスキ:
<size=22>Dirt・If you activate any other skill during
the Middle Leg, your speed will increase;
then, if you activate any other skill
during the Final Leg or beyond, you will
get a speed boost</size>
text.レース中盤にスキルを発動すると\\n速度がちょっと上がる\\nその後レース終盤に:
<size=22>Dirt・If you activate any other skill during
the Middle Leg, your speed will marginally
increase; then, if you activate any other
skill during the Final Leg or beyond,
you will get a marginal speed boost</size>
text.レース中盤に前の方にいると\\n持久力をわずかに回復する\\n＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・At a random point during the Middle\nLeg, if you're in the first half of the\npack, your stamina will slightly recover</size>
text.レース前半中団以降に控え続けていると\\nレース終盤かつ最終コーナー以降に\\n:
<size=22>If you stayed in the back of the pack
