then during the Final Corner, you will
get a speed boost; the effect is stronger
in Long races</size>
text.レース中間付近で前の方から\\n仕掛け始める時に少しの間速度が上がる\\nマイル:
<size=22>Around the middle of the race, if you're
near the front and about to overtake someone,
your speed will increase; the effect is
stronger in Mile races</size>
text.コーナーで速度が上がる＜短距離＞: <size=22>Short・At a random point on a random corner,\nyour speed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で\\n余力十分なら前に出る\\n＜追込・長距離＞: <size=22>Chaser・Long・If you have plenty of stamina\nleft during the first half of the Final\nLeg, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で\\n余力十分ならわずかに前に出る\\n＜追込・長距離＞: <size=22>Chaser・Long・If you have plenty of stamina\nleft during the first half of the Final\nLeg, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.スタート時に加速力が上がる\\n＜短距離＞: <size=22>Short・At the start of the race, your acceleration\nwill increase</size>
text.スタート時に加速力がわずかに上がる\\n＜短距離＞: <size=22>Short・At the start of the race, your acceleration\nwill slightly increase</size>
text.最終コーナーで速度がすごく上がる: <size=22>During the Final Corner, your speed will\ngreatly increase</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で\\n余力十分ならすごく前に出る\\n＜追込・長距離＞: <size=22>Chaser・Long・If you have plenty of stamina\nleft during the first half of the Final\nLeg, your speed will greatly increase</size>
text.レース中盤に速度がすごく上がる\\n＜作戦・先行＞: <size=22>Leader・At a random point in the Middle\nLeg, your speed will greatly increase</size>
text.コーナーで加速力が上がり\\nさらに速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>At a random point on a random corner,\nyour acceleration will increase and your\nspeed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース中盤が迫ったとき前の方にいると\\nしばらくの間速度が上がる＜短距離＞: <size=22>Short・If you're in the first half of the\npack during the second half of the Opening\nLeg, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース後半に3番手以降だと\\nしばらくの間速度が上がる\\n＜作戦・先行＞: <size=22>Leader・If you're 3rd or worse during the\nsecond half of the race, your speed will\nincrease</size>
text.レース後半に後方から追い抜いていた\\n場合、残り150mを切ってから前の方に\:
<size=22>If you overtook someone in the back of
the pack during the second half of the
race, then when there's less than 150
m remaining and you're near the front
of the pack, your speed will increase</size>

<size=22>If you overtook someone in the back of
the pack during the second half of the
race, then when there's less than 150
m remaining and you're near the front
of the pack, your speed will greatly increase</size>
text.レース終盤に後ろの方だと\\n速度が上がり、加速力がわずかに上がる\\n＜短距離:
<size=22>Short・If you're in the second half of
the pack at a random point during the
Final Leg, your speed will increase and
your acceleration will slightly increase</size>
text.レースを冷静に運ぶことができると\\nラストスパートの最中に\\n速度をわずかに: <size=22>If you haven't panicked (kakari) during\nthe race, then during the last spurt,\nyour speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レースを冷静に運ぶことができると\\nラストスパートの最中に\\n速度を少し上げ: <size=22>If you haven't panicked (kakari) during\nthe race, then during the last spurt,\nyour speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース中間地点で後方にいると\\n速度が上がる、その後終盤の\\n最終コーナーで:
<size=22>If you're in the second half of the pack
halfway through the race, your speed will
increase; then, if you try to overtake
someone during the Final Corner in the
Final Leg, you will get a slight speed
boost</size>
text.レース中盤が迫ったとき\\n速度が上がる: <size=22>During the second half of the Opening\nLeg, your speed will increase</size>
text.終盤の最終コーナーで中団以降にいると\\n加速力が上がる\\n＜追込・中距離＞: <size=22>Chaser・Medium・If you're not in the front\nduring the Final Corner in the Final Leg,\nyour acceleration will increase</size>
text.終盤の最終コーナーで中団以降にいると\\n加速力がわずかに上がる\\n＜追込・中: <size=22>Chaser・Medium・If you're not in the front\nduring the Final Corner in the Final Leg,\nyour acceleration will slightly increase</size>
text.最終直線で2番手以降で\\n先頭から4バ身以内にいると\\n速度が少し上がる＜作: <size=22>Chaser・During the Final Straight, if you're\nsecond or worse but close to the first\nplace, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース中盤が迫ったとき\\n後方にいると持久力を\\nわずかに回復する＜作戦・追:
<size=22>Chaser・If you're in the second half of
the pack during the second half of the
Opening Leg, your stamina will slightly
recover</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき\\n中団以降にいると速度がわずかに上がる\\n＜作戦・追: <size=22>Chaser・If you're not in the front during\nthe second half of the Middle Leg, your\nspeed will slightly increase</size>
text.最終コーナーで後方だと前後3人\\nずつの速度をほんのわずかに下げ、自分\\nの:
<size=22>Chaser・If you're in the second half of
the pack at a random point during the
Final Corner, your speed will slightly
increase, and the speed of the closest
three girls in front and three girls behind
you will slightly decrease</size>
text.レース中盤に持久力を少し使って\\n速度が少し上がる＜作戦・追込＞: <size=22>Chaser・At a random point during the Middle\nLeg, use a little extra stamina to increase\nyour speed</size>
text.レース後半に追い抜こうとすると\\n速度がわずかに上がる＜作戦・追込＞: <size=22>Chaser・If you try to overtake someone\nduring the second half of the race, your\nspeed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース中盤に後方にいると\\n前の速度をほんのわずかに下げ\\n自分の速度がわず:
<size=22>Chaser・Medium・If you're in the second
half of the pack at a random point during
the Middle Leg, your speed will slightly
increase, and you will slightly lower

of you</size>
text.レース中盤に速度が上がる\\nU.A.F.決勝大会の優勝数に応じて\\n効果が高:

Middle Leg, your speed will increase;
the effect is stronger the more U.A.F.

text.レース後半にわずかに前に出る\\n根性が十二分に高いと少し前に出る\\n＜マイル:

slightly increase; the effect is stronger

text.レース中盤が迫ったとき\\n速度がすごく上がる＜マイル/中距離＞: <size=22>Mile/Medium・During the second half of\nthe Opening Leg, your speed will greatly\nincrease</size>
text.レース中盤に追い抜くと\\n速度がすごく上がる＜マイル/中距離＞: <size=22>Mile/Medium・If you overtake someone during\nthe Middle Leg, your speed will greatly\nincrease</size>
text.ラストスパートの最中に\\n速度がすごく上がる＜マイル/中距離＞: <size=22>Mile/Medium・At a random point in the first\nhalf of Last Spurt, your speed will greatly\nincrease</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき\\n中団以前にいると速度がすごく上がる\\n＜マイル＞: <size=22>Mile・If you're not in the back of the\npack during the second half of the Middle\nLeg, your speed will greatly increase</size>
text.最終コーナーで中団以降にいると\\n速度がすごく上がる＜マイル＞: <size=22>Mile・If you're not in the front during\nthe last corner, your speed will greatly\nincrease</size>
text.レース中盤に中団以前にいると\\n速度がすごく上がる＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・If you're not in the back of the\npack at a random point during the Middle\nLeg, your speed will greatly increase</size>
text.レース中盤に中団以降にいると\\n速度がすごく上がる＜中距離＞: <size=22>Medium・If you're not in the front at a\nrandom point during the Middle Leg, your\nspeed will greatly increase</size>
text.レース中間地点で\\n持久力をすごく回復する＜先行/差し＞: <size=22>Leader/Betweener・Halfway through the race,\nyour stamina will greatly recover</size>
text.レース中間地点で持久力を少し使って\\n速度をものすごく上げる＜先行/差し＞: <size=22>Leader/Betweener・Halfway through the race,\nuse a little extra stamina to increase\nyour speed tremendously</size>
text.レース中盤のコーナーで\\nしばらくの間速度が上がる: <size=22>During a random Middle Leg corner, your\nspeed will increase</size>
text.終盤の最終コーナーまたは中山レース\\n場の終盤のコーナーで中団以降だと\\n加:
<size=22>Chaser・Medium・If you're not in the front
during the Final Corner in the Final Leg

your acceleration will increase; then,
during the Last Straight, your speed will
slightly increase</size>
text.レース後半まで前方をキープしていて\\nライバルのウマ娘が加速スキルを発動\\n:
<size=22>If you stayed in the top 20% for the entire

opponents uses an acceleration skill,
your speed will slightly increase; in
dirt races on big racetracks (non-NAR),
you will also get a speed boost</size>
text.レース中盤が迫ったとき前方にいると\\n速度が上がる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you're in the first half of the\npack during the second half of the Opening\nLeg, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース中盤が迫ったとき前方にいると\\n速度がわずかに上がる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you're in the first half of the\npack during the second half of the Opening\nLeg, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース序盤にスキルを多く発動すると\\n加速力が上がる、マイルか中距離\\nレー:
<size=22>If you've activated at least 3 skills
during the Opening Leg, your acceleration
will increase; in Mile and Medium races,
it will increase greatly</size>
text.レース中盤が迫ったとき前方にいると\\n速度がすごく上がる＜ダート＞: <size=22>Dirt・If you're in the first half of the\npack during the second half of the Opening\nLeg, your speed will greatly increase</size>
text.レース前半のコーナーで中団にいると\\n速度を少し上げる、短距離かマイル\\nレ:
<size=22>If you're in the middle of the pack on
any corner during the first half of the
race, your speed will slightly increase;
bonus duration in Short and Mile races</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき前方にいると\\n速度がすごく上がる＜マイル＞: <size=22>Mile・If you're in the first half of the\npack during the second half of the Middle\nLeg, your speed will greatly increase</size>
text.レース序盤に前方で競り合ったとき\\n速度を上げる、マイルレースなら\\n持久力:
<size=22>During the Opening Leg, if you're in the

from the side, your speed will increase;
in Mile races, your speed will increase

text.レース中間付近で中団にいると\\n速度が少し上がる\\nマイルレースなら効果と時:

through the race, your speed will slightly
increase; the effect is stronger and lasts
longer in Mile races</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき\\n中団以降にいると速度が上がる\\n＜マイル＞: <size=22>Mile・If you're not in the front during\nthe second half of the Middle Leg, your\nspeed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき\\n中団以降にいると速度がわずかに上がる\\n＜マイル＞: <size=22>Mile・If you're not in the front during\nthe second half of the Middle Leg, your\nspeed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース終盤にしばらくの間\\n前に出る＜マイル＞: <size=22>Mile・At a random point during the Final\nLeg, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で前方にいると\\n加速力が上がる\\nその後残り300mを切:
<size=22>Leader・During the first half of the Final

pack, your acceleration will increase;
then, when there's less than 300 m left
in the race, your speed will slightly
increase</size>
text.下り坂で加速力が少し上がる\\nその後残り300mを切っているとき\\n速度がわ:
<size=22>Leader・At a random point on any downhill,
your acceleration will increase; then,
when there's less than 300 m left in the
race, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース後半にすごく前に出る\\n＜作戦・差し＞: <size=22>Betweener・At a random point in the second\nhalf of the race, your speed will greatly\nincrease</size>
text.レース終盤始めに追い抜こうとするとき\\nまたはレース終盤始めの方で\\n加速力:
<size=22>Betweener・Mile・If you're trying to overtake
someone at the start of the Final Leg,
your acceleration will increase; if these
conditions are not achieved, the skill

first half of the Final Leg</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき\\n中団以降にいるとしばらくの間\\n速度が上がる＜マイ: <size=22>Mile・If you're not in the front during\nthe second half of the Middle Leg, your\nspeed will increase</size>
text.レース中盤に中団で追い抜くと\\n第3コーナーで少しの間速度が上がる\\n240:
<size=22>If you overtake someone from the middle
of the pack during the Middle Leg, then
on the third corner, your speed will increase;
bonus duration if you're top 3 in popularity
in a 2400 m race</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき4番手以降だと\\n速度が上がる、東京レース場の\\n24:
<size=22>Medium・If you're 4th or worse during the
second half of the Middle Leg, your speed
will increase; it will increase greatly
if it's a 2400 m Tokyo race</size>
text.レース前半に中団ですぐ前かすぐ後ろに\\nウマ娘が長くいると持久力をわずかに\\:
<size=22>If another girl has been right behind

text.レース終盤が迫ったとき中団以降だと\\n前後3人ずつの速度をわずかに下げ\\n自:
<size=22>Betweener・At a random point on the Final
Corner, if you're not in the front, your
speed will greatly increase, and you will
slow down three closest girls both ahead
and behind you</size>
text.レース中間付近で競り合っていると\\nレース後半のどこかで速度が上がる\\nスキ:
<size=22>If someone was blocking you from the side
around halfway through the race, then
at a random point in the second half of
the race, your speed will increase; it
will increase greatly if you're currently
running in the inner lane</size>
text.レース中盤のコーナーで好位置にいると\\n持久力を回復する\\n中距離か長距離レ:

your stamina will recover; in Medium and
Long races, your speed will also slightly
increase</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき\\n中団以降にいると速度が上がる\\n＜作戦・追込＞: <size=22>Chaser・If you're not in the front during\nthe second half of the Middle Leg, your\nspeed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方早めに中団以降に\\nいると加速力がわずかに上がる\\n＜追込: <size=22>Chaser・Long・If you're not in the front\nduring the first quarter of the Final\nLeg, your acceleration will slightly increase</size>
text.レース中盤に前方にいると\\n速度がすごく上がる\\n＜作戦・逃げ＞: <size=22>Runner・If you're in the first half of\nthe pack at a random point during the\nMiddle Leg, your speed will greatly increase</size>
text.レース終盤目前に先頭か先頭から6バ身\\n以内につけると、レース終盤に\\n加速:

text.レース中盤に競り合うと\\n速度がすごく上がる＜長距離＞: <size=22>Long・If you're being blocked from the\nside during the Middle Leg, your speed\nwill greatly increase</size>
text.終盤の最終コーナーで中団以前にいる時\\nゴールまで遠いと加速力が上がる\\nそ:
<size=22>Leader/Betweener・If you're on the final

will slightly increase</size>
text.レース後半に追い抜こうとすると\\n前に出る、内ラチ側にいると\\n効果が増える:
<size=22>Leader/Betweener・If you try to overtake

your speed will increase; it will increase

the inner lane</size>
text.レース中盤に中団以降にいると\\n持久力をわずかに回復し速度が上がる\\n＜作戦:
<size=22>Betweener・At a random point during the

your stamina will slightly recover and
your speed will increase</size>
text.終盤の最終コーナー以降で前方だと\\n少しの間速度がすごく上がる\\n中距離レー:
<size=22>If you're in the first half of the pack

will greatly increase; in Medium races,
you will receive an (immediate) great
speed boost instead</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき\\n前方にいると速度が上がる\\n＜作戦・先行＞: <size=22>Leader・If you're in the first half of\nthe pack during the second half of the\nMiddle Leg, your speed will increase</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき\\n前方にいると速度がわずかに上がる\\n＜作戦・先行＞: <size=22>Leader・If you're in the first half of\nthe pack during the second half of the\nMiddle Leg, your speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき\\n前方にいると速度がすごく上がる\\n中距離レースなら:
<size=22>Leader・If you're in the first half of
the pack during the second half of the
Middle Leg, your speed will greatly increase;

text.近くにウマ娘がたくさんいると\\n速度が上がる、さらに2000mの\\nレースで:
<size=22>If there are at least three other girls

text.最終コーナーで好位置にいると\\n少しの間速度が上がる\\nマイルレースなら効果:
<size=22>If you're in a good position (but not

speed will increase; bonus duration in
Mile races</size>
text.レース中盤に追い抜くと\\nしばらくの間速度が上がる\\n賢さが十二分に高いと\:

text.レース終盤始めの方で前方にいると\\n加速力が上がり、その後残り200m地点\\:

Leg, your acceleration will increase;
then, when there's 200 m remaining, your
speed will slightly increase</size>
text.レース中盤以降の下り坂で後方にいると\\n持久力を少し使って短い間前に出る\\n:
<size=22>If you're in the second half of the pack

the Last Straight, if your motivation
is at least Good, your speed will increase</size>
text.残り600mを切って中団で外から\\n追い抜いていると、ラストスパートの\\n最:
<size=22>When there's less than 600 m remaining,
if you're in the middle of the pack and
overtake someone from the outside, then
during the Last Spurt, your speed will
increase</size>
text.直線で速度が上がる＜マイル＞: <size=22>Mile・At a random point on a random straight,\nyour speed will increase</size>
text.レース中盤に持久力を少し使って\\n速度がすごく上がる＜作戦・追込＞: <size=22>Chaser・At a random point during the Middle\nLeg, use a little extra stamina to greatly\nincrease your speed</size>
text.直線のコースが得意になる: <size=22>Your Speed stat is increased by 60 on\ntracks with no corners</size>
text.直線のコースが少し得意になる: <size=22>Your Speed stat is increased by 40 on\ntracks with no corners</size>
text.直線のコースが少し苦手になる: <size=22>Your Speed stat is decreased by 40 on\ntracks with no corners</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で加速力が上がる\\n2200mのレースなら持久力を少し使い\:

on 2200 m tracks specifically, near the
start of the Final Leg, use a little extra
stamina to greatly increase your acceleration</size>
text.レース中盤に持久力を少し使って\\n速度がすごく上がる、その後終盤の\\n最終直:

Leg, use a little extra stamina to greatly

of the race on the Final Straight, your

text.レース終盤に加速力が上がる\\n＜短距離/マイル＞: <size=22>Short/Mile・At a random point during the\nFinal Leg, your acceleration will increase</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき中団以降だと\\n速度がすごく上がる＜短距離/マイル＞: <size=22>Short/Mile・If you're not near the front\nduring the second half of the Middle Leg,\nyour speed will greatly increase</size>
text.レース終盤始めの方で中団以降にいると\\n加速力が上がる\\nその後残り300m:
<size=22>Medium・During the first half of the Final
Leg, if you're not near the front, your
acceleration will increase; then, with
300 m remaining, your speed will slightly
increase</size>
text.レース中盤のコーナーで\\nすごく前に出る＜先行・中距離＞: <size=22>Leader・Medium・Your speed will greatly\nincrease on a random corner during the\nMiddle Leg</size>
text.レース中盤始めの方に前の方だと\\n速度がわずかに上がり持久力を回復する\\n＜:
<size=22>Medium・If you're in the first half of
the pack during the first half of the
Middle Leg, your speed will slightly increase
